name: Cherry Bomb
description: Cherry Bomb is a basic arcade Shoot 'em up game (Shmup) reminiscent of Space Invaders or Galaga. Pilot your red spaceship to blast your way through 9 waves of attacking aliens.

name: Amusement Inferno
description: Medium sized dark fantasy castle map with industrial bits, with textures by Makkon. Map source and custom music is included. Requires Copper v1.19+

name: Existential Dread
description: Existential Dread was a warmup project, to get back into making doom maps and vanilla in particular.

name: Plutonia Revisited Community Project 2
description: Plutonia Revisited Community Project 2 (PRCP2) is a continuation in the series of Plutonia-inspired megawads. During Plutonia 3's development, there were a handful of great maps that didn't quite fit in a Plutonia 3 megawad but would fit great in a PRCP megawad. So PRCP2 was started! PRCP2 is not as classic as PRCP or Plutonia itself, but we dare say the spirit is very Plutonian and fun to play.

name: Disk-0 Madness
description: You are a lone space-disk in an unfriendly territory, survive for as long as you can!

name: Left at Home
description: Freckles is left at home sick as their partner, Beads, goes out to buy them medication.

name: Terraforma
description: Grow your land by placing blocks & buildings while carefully planning your placements, and make your own little world in this small idle game.

name: Super Mario Skycastle
description: Upon enjoying a picnic, Mario and Luigi witness the Princess’s capture by Bowser! However, in an attempt to stop the brothers, the evil Koopa sends his strongest minions after them, making this much more difficult! Bowser plans to destroy the Mushroom Kingdom, using his new Castle in the Sky, and thus, the princess is not all you must worry about.

name: Garry's worst fear
description:
Garry's worst fear is a TopDown point and click, turn based fighting game.
through garry's eyes you must face his worst fears in his cochemard

name: My Sweet Sadistic Sister
description:
After living alone with your dad for the past ten years, he has some news—he's getting married and you're getting a stepsister! Fortunately, it turns out that she's one of the kindest girls in your school… or so you thought. Turns out she's a sadistic bully, and now she's blackmailing you! Will you be able to keep this secret from your best friend and the classmate you're ordered to spy on?

How will you navigate your new life with a sadistic sister?

name: Nik and Kit: Kit's Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Blue Blood
description: An action platformer about a fox that protects their cubs. Jump, dash and fight through the mountain, collecting food and unveiling the mysteries it hides.

name: Nump Jump
description: Sin descripción

name: The Jumping Kebab: Turbo
description:
Join BIG K on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!
Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Drift Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: Chronicles of Cyberpunk: Deep Sleep
description: Chronicles of cyberpunk - Deep sleep - is an exciting story about the confrontation between Big Brother and Supercomputer in unusual world

name: Quantum Maki
description: Sin descripción

name: Trails of the Last Day
description: A zombie apocalypse game where you play as the last survival team of humankind.

name: First Flight
description: Sin descripción

name: Hakai
description:
Hakai is a momentum based aerial fighting game that takes cues from Dragonball Z.
Win three rounds to beat your opponent. If the timer runs out, whoever has the lower amount of health wins, and if the players' health are equal it's a draw.

name: Ayakashi Yaji
description:
You came here because you wanted something, didn't you?

Navigate through a night market full of yokai and mystery.

name: SlumberspaVIE: Visual Interactive Experience
description: A short desktop hidden-object game featuring music from the Slumberspa EP by Kaizo Slumber and original GBA-style visuals. Available as a download bonus.

name: Bakusou Kyoudai Let's & Go!!
description: The authorized mobile game "Bakusou Kyoudai Let's & Go!!" , will take you back to your childhood, and have a classic mini 4WD race! Come on Let's & Go!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Futanari Threesome
description: Challenging 6 by 6 jigsaw puzzles, featuring adult images of a couple and a futanari, having an erotic threesome.

name: Dynacore
description: An action roguelike shooter with procedurally generated weapons

name: Reouija Sleepover
description:
Reouija Sleepover is the 2022 remake of Ouija Sleepover, a 2020 jam game.

The game has been completely revamped; new art, new dialogue, new scenes, new CGs and 2 new endings. The main endings have also been extended.

name: JR's
description: JR's is an all-around investigation type FNaF fan-game. Each night, a select bunch of animatronics becomes haunted, and it's your job to weed out which ones are haunted, and which ones aren't. Search for clues and hints throughout the nights, in order to lead you who is possessed.

name: Magneko
description: Magneko is a casual platform game. in the cute handmade toy world, you can jump or use the magnet magic to move, solve puzzles and collect dried fish to pass the levels. With a simple mouse click, you can use magic and begin your adventure.

name: Light
description: The protagonist is to commemorate the Syrian boy on the beach, control the character to escape and solve mysteries in my fictional inner world, understand the worldview of the game and the cruelty of past wars during this period, and finally make their own real choices.

name: Mud Way
description: Mud wants to live, but it has to face a race for survival through several Stages with different characteristics. Combining elements as diverse as adventure, maze, enemy swarm, platforming, run for life, roguelike, exploration, stealth and find the key to advance.

name: Adventure Trip: New York - Collector's Edition
description: Want to experience the adventure of the Big Apple? From the lush green Central Park to the city view from the Brooklyn Bridge and beautiful historical landmark such as the classic Rockefeller Center. The game will take you through 20 ethereal locations.

name: Nightmare Hunter
description: One day in the dream, some one showed up and claimed there is a dream called paradise. From that day, dream demons that can suck human memory and spirit increased. In order to make everything return to its original state, Yoru, who awakened as a demon hunter, decided to challenge the initiator.

name: Clashbowl
description: Have fun & enjoy the best VR bowling atmosphere & graphics! Exactly like in real life right from your own comfort And without leaving your house!

name: Jeff Logar
description: The game tells the story of Jeff Logar and his daughters Tahoma and Sahale. Both girls run away after heavy row with their brutish father Jeff. They got lost in the dark forests of Seattle (USA). There, Jeff will undergo a lifechanging transformation to save his daughters.

name: Cooper's Cleanup
description: Cooper's Cleanup is a top-down collect-a-thon. You play as C.O.O.P.E.R, a robot vacuum who is moving around a home, "cleaning" up the collectibles hidden throughout the level. However, C.O.O.P.E.R is new to his environment, and needs some time to find his way around.

name: Cells of Immunity
description: Become a young white blood cell in training and learn how they mature and fight against invading pathogens. Team up with other types of cells, with unique strengths and weaknesses, and overcome disease for good. To serve and protect the human body at all costs.

name: Hover Racer
description: Take control of your Hovercrafts in this fantastic arcade racing game, based on real physics.

name: Food Factory
description: Food Factory is game where players can produce food using various machines starting from gathering base products.

name: Tales From Toyotoki: Arrival of the Witch
description: A boy moves to a remote island in Okinawa and is informed that his grandfather, who was supposed to take care of him, has evaporated. When he is ready to fend for himself on the remote island, he meets a girl who calls herself a witch. The girl deals with magic from another world and life on a remote island where Ryukyuan culture is deeply rooted. What fate awaits them both? ────

name: M87
description: An computer's artificial intelligence (AI) becomes the dominant form of intelligence on Earth, as computer programs and robots effectively take the control of the planet away from the human species. M87 is ex special force marine, and he is the only on in this world who can take this world back

name: Entropy: Zero 2
description:
The pessimistic, wisecracking, door-kicking zealot known as 'Bad Cop' is back.

Command a small army of Combine synths and soldiers on a Northern campaign to capture Dr. Judith Mossman.

Tread in the wake of Gordon Freeman at Nova Prospekt. Explore the mysterious 'Arbeit Communications' facility. Discover what lies beneath. Drive an APC through the arctic wastes. Confront the rebels on their doorstep and uncover a long-forgotten secret.

name: Soul Light
description: Kaya is a simple herbalist who denies her magic. But her native forest began to die, and only she can save it. A fellow tribe named Hary and an unfamiliar witch Anna, who is pursuing her goals will help her in this. Will Kaya be able to save the forest and not die on her own?

name: Agent X
description: Agent X is a short FPS game. The police officers named Turk give 5 task to complete! Let's see if Agent X can withstand against bad girls!

name: Slow Burn
description: Slow Burn is the first and only book of the Slow Burn series.

name: Summer Games
description: A bundle containing multiple versions of the classic Summer Games.

name: 10 am Break
description: 5 quick maps for your 15 minute morning break from work.

name: Brain Rot Excellence
description: Brain Rot Excellence is a Yume Nikki fan game mainly inspired by Broken Bottles and Space Funeral. You follow Brianna Ruth as she explores her mind while in a drug induced coma, inside her she meet Nocebo, a strangely self aware creature who latches unto her and aids her in combat. To be able to wake up from your coma you have to figure out what happened to you and hopefully regain control. The game is exploration based with a little bit of combat thrown in.

name: Madden NFL 23
description:
Play your way into the history books in Madden NFL 23!
Control your impact with every decision in all-new ways. Call the shots in Franchise with free agency and trade logic updates, play your way into the history books in Face of the Franchise: The League, and assemble the most powerful roster in all of Madden Ultimate Team.

name: Maggot Face
description: Your sister and a lot of other people are missing, solve the mystery and find your sister Kirsty!

name: Kryptoria
description: Kryptoria is an immersive 4X and RTS game enabled by the Ethereum blockchain, that encourages players to build an empire in the world of Kryptoria, through economic, technological and military power.

name: Fiend Folio: Reheated
description: A fan made expansion mod for The Binding of Isaac: Rebrith that overhauls the game's floors, adds over 500 new enemies, 23 new bosses, 2 new characters and plenty of new items!

name: Pararomantic
description: Blood-curdling dating-sim visual-novel.

name: Ribon: Sabukseong Gyeoljeon
description: Sin descripción

name: FreshWomen
description: FreshWomen is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel focusing on the best parts of life. Become a freshman attending Minerva Bay College, romance girls and solve a mysterious incident. Your journey will be filled with comedy, drama, and lots of sex.

name: Partypit Games
description: Play our games with friends and family using your personal mobile devices and a shared display. Have a blast in the same room or sync your screen to join a game from across the globe.

name: S&M: FL
description:
"S&M: FL" is a board + action reaction class of inverse tower defense game. Players need to roll dice on the board to move, and through various actions to eliminate the enemy stronghold, finally bring peace to the village!
In combat, players can make use of the Shield counter mechanic and use different skills to fight enemies.
Shield counter is when you look at the right moment to block an enemy's attack and use it to trigger skills.

name: A Tale of Paper: Refolded - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: A Tale of Paper: Refolded Digital Deluxe Edition includes the full game with 3 prequal chapters and the official soundtrack featuring 26 songs composed by Èric Seró and Adrián Berenguer.

name: Dungman: The Dungeon Crawler
description: A fun short score based dungeon crawler for the playdate handheld

name: Logic Pic: Complete Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Puzzle Galaxy: Drawings Bundle
description: With this bundle you can get 50 New jigsaw puzzles to assemble in two DLCs: Space & Steam and Cuteness Overload.

name: Spin Path
description: Get addicted to this fast paced racing game! Excellent graphics and an endless supply of levels will keep you hooked Get the frenzy star and smash your way to the goal!

name: A Tale of Paper: Refolded
description: A Tale of Paper: Refolded is a puzzle-platformer that tells the story of Line, a magical character made of paper who uses origami to change shape. Transform into a frog, rocket, bird and more as Line embarks on an emotional journey to fulfill the dream of its creator.

name: Ninja Fun
description: Ninja Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: I'm in Love With Your Dead Grandmother
description: Sin descripción

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Extended Edition
description: Start your baking career and prepare some delicious cakes for your clients, using a whole set of creams, fruits, and decorations. Test your skills on 60 diverse and increasingly difficult levels.

name: The Jumping Kebab
description:
Join BIG N on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!
Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Tina & Rook! Cookie Quest!
description: Two idiots are hungry for cookies after playing some games! and for some screw-up reason, you have to go through a whole puzzle to get that. Will these 2 idiots get to eat their cookies and enjoy their afternoon?

name: TrainFormation
description: TrainFormation is a simple, fast-paced puzzle game created by one student as a university project. Place rails in front of an ever-accelerating train to cross procedurally generated levels, reach stations, collect power ups and make it as far as you can!

name: Kawaii Hentai Girls 3
description: It's a relaxing anime puzzle with cute kawaii girls. Solve puzzles, and enjoy high-quality artwork.

name: Monster Girl Dormitory
description: “Monster Girl Dormitory”is a decryption game, find items according to the hints on the character to complete the decryption.

name: AimX
description: Free aim trainer for all FPS & TPS players. AimX adapts to your game so you can improve in the most efficient way.

name: Kikura
description: The second installment of the KIK series! "Utsushiyochigai" is a world that exists parallel to the present world in which we live, a world inhabited by gods and Yokai. This story is a new generation Urashima Taro, in which two girls confront yokai in order to solve the cursed beach incident!

name: Your Love Story
description: This is a AVG telling a realistic love story, which tells the story through interactive movies. It's about summer, youth memories and growth.

name: Iles
description: A platform game.

name: Femboys & Fries
description: The fries are hot and the femboys are sizzling. This will be an experience that you won't soon forget!

name: PongPong Girl
description: PongPong Girl is a new Breakout game, with a sprinkle of RPG. Have a beautiful encounte with girls!

name: Fly Tales
description: Welcome in Fly Tales which a casual game in which the player controls an aircraft and tries with all his might to maneuver past various obstacles, from air spiders and spiked earthen ledges to stone shifts in the earth's crust and flying bombs.

name: Space Crusaders
description: Try to survive the demon onslaught in this fast-paced top-down shooter. Battle oncoming enemies as they try to destroy you, collect their souls to level up your character and weapons. Collect relics and unlock new characters and weapons to become more powerful!

name: Project: Knight 2 Dusk of Souls
description: I saw that tall castle in my dream where normally there was an island... I'm now lost and there is no turning back... A lonely knight on top of a deadly castle... This game is a real time combat collectathon in the style of Dark Souls where you have to collect emblems to progress through a castle...

name: Demolish & Build 3: Excavator Playground
description: Demolish & Build 3: Excavator Playground is a playable sneak peek at the driving and demolition physics from the upcoming Demolition & Build 3. In the game, you take control of a modern excavator and drive around a small test track or demolish structures.

name: Crustacean Nations
description: Crustacean Nations is a real-time strategy game about total crab warfare. Build a sprawling sand castle and amass huge armies to dominate the beach and become the one true crustacean nation!

name: First Date: Late to Date
description:
First Date: Late To Date is a romantic-comedy interactive cinematic (FMV) game in which the audience determines the progress of the movie with the options that appear every minute.
Erdem must make Derya forgive him in this late first meeting, or their relationship will end before it ever started.
Erdem will be dragged along different paths with the decisions he will make, and he will be able to experience many situations that may arise from the relationship between men and women. Every decision he takes will lead him to different paths and different endings.

name: Rune Teller
description: Become a powerful Rune Teller traveling through the open world of the Runegea. Recruit great colleagues for a fun journey, craft through a variety of items, and solve the requests of the Runegea residents. At the end of a long journey, you will find the reason for your resurrection.

name: We See You
description: We See You is a rhythm based down-scrolling runner. You play as a pair of eyes trying to go as deep as possible, avoiding enemies moving in different patterns with a goal to get a good score to top the leaderboard.

name: Happy's Clocks
description: Run around an enormous mysterious house that once belonged to your dad, while running away from terrifying monsters and solving interesting puzzles. Discover what happened or maybe what was supposed to happen when you left.

name: Security Booth: Director's Cut
description: Based in 1996, you work for a science lab known as Nova Nexus. You work as a security guard at the front gate of Nova Nexus inside a guard booth. However, tonight it seems something important is happening inside of Nova Nexus and things are... well... a little strange.

name: Madden NFL 23: All Madden Edition
description: Play your way into the history books! Updates to your favorite modes deliver all-new ways to control your impact with every decision. Call the shots in Franchise, establish a legacy in Face of the Franchise: The League, and dominate in Madden Ultimate Team.

name: Yonesawara Hospital
description:
Yonesawara Hospital is a single-player exploration horror game from the first-person perspective.
The game focuses on the search for the abandoned hospital "Yonesawara Hospital", and by finding various clues, the truth about what happened at the hospital will be revealed.

name: A Last Will and Testament
description: First-person horror game in an escape room style with nice graphics, inventory, story, voiceover and good price & gameplay. Solve puzzles, collect notes. Fulfill the last will and find a testament.

name: Madden NFL 23
description: Play your way into the history books! Updates to your favorite modes deliver all-new ways to control your impact with every decision. Call the shots in Franchise, establish a legacy in Face of the Franchise: The League, and dominate in Madden Ultimate Team.

name: Mire
description: Mire is a difficult game where you play as a fly and fight giant predators, navigate the caves, swamp, and treetops to bring peace to the mire.

name: The Robot Girl Meets the Human!
description: This is an adventure game that takes you on a journey through a world after humans have disappeared. Lead the robot girl "Scarlet" to find the surviving humans.

name: Arenas of Tanks
description: Fire up for fun with Arenas of Tanks, a tactical toy tank game! Use skill and strategy to defeat enemy tanks and upgrade your team

name: Spelldash
description: Spellburst is a fast paced magical FPS game where you control fire, air, ice and lightning elements to use various spells, fight against exotic monsters and explore different planets with parkour and platforming elements

name: Grand Hike
description: Go on a unique and unforgettable Hike and discover the old historical forest and it's secrets. Get ready for an calm and relaxing adventure far away from the civilization. What kinds of encounters will your Hike have?

name: Berserk Soccer
description: A soccer game with a brutal playing style.

name: Sir Whoopass: Immortal Death
description: Meet Sir Whoopass, the hero who due to a series of hilarious and poor life choices manages to bring chaos and disarray to an utopian world. He must find The Villain-Beating Artifact to vanquish The Immortal and stop him from spawning all manner of evil monsters and creatures. Also cheese.

name: Skinwalker Hunt
description: Skinwalker Hunt is a horror themed hunting game from the creator of Witch Hunt. Main focus of the game is on exploration, non-linearity, and atmosphere.

name: ZooKeeper
description: ZooKeeper is a simulation game in which you are responsible for managing your own Zoo and for making your place as popular as possible among visitors and employees. Take care of the animals, create new biomes for rare animals, hire employees, build amazing Zoo!

name: Maestro: The Masterclass
description: Step on the podium and become a true orchestra conductor in Maestro: The Masterclass. Play hands free or grab a chopstick and master the real hands motions that command the orchestra through an off the rail conducting masterclass that culminates with an epic symphonic concert in a packed opera house. Good luck, Maestro!

name: Bandle
description: A daily guessing game in which players aim to determine a mystery song using a limited set of the component tracks. Every incorrect guess will provide more information to help players identify the mystery song.

name: Hopscotch
description: Hopscotch contains twenty mini-maps, each containing a small platforming/puzzle challenge.

name: Cuber 2: Ice Age
description: Cuber 2: Ice Age is the sequel of Cuber if your not sure you will like this game play Cuber one and then come back.

name: O Seresteiro
description:
In this musical adventure for all ages, the Seresteiro will go from Oiapoque to Chuí on a journey through Brazil, in search of the band that will stand up to his rival, the monster Romildo.

On his way he will face challenges and defeat enemies, spreading happiness through his singing.

name: NoCanNoTap
description:
1.Tap to remove Woods as many as possible.
2.Keep thing(wood/stone/sponge) below the Role.
3.Wait green bar to be full and You Win!

name: Upgrade 2021-22: Bionic Traveler
description: A compilation of the collaborative efforts of the University of Pennsylvania Game Research and Development Environment's programmers, artists, writers, and sound engineers over the 2021-2022 academic year. Fight our enemies, view our art, explore our scenes, and listen to our soundtrack!

name: State of Mind
description: Barry has the sick man blues and has lost his mojo.....He is very depressed and has not gone out, eaten or slept properly for weeks.... Can his friends help him raise his vibrations and get a better state of mind? A journey into healing....

name: Cold Ice Remastered
description: This project is a modern open-sourced rebuild of Cold Ice 1.75, a popular Half-Life mod back in 1999. Set in a winter scene, its philosophy is to deliver a deathmatch that doesn't take itself seriously. Only in this mod will you find voiceover cameos from Samuel L. Jackson, Hans Gruber, and "Leeroy Jenkins" by Ben Schulz. Its ethos delivers an explosively frantic fast-paced gameplay that was and always will be Cold Ice.

name: The Ascent: Cyber Warrior Pack
description: Cyberpunk meets Samurai with the Cyber Warrior Pack! Stand out in Veles like the Cyber Warrior you deserve to be, with this Samurai inspired look, including 2 new weapons, 1 new tactical, 7 pieces of armor and 3 new weapon skins.

name: Scar of the Doll: A Psycho-Horror Story about the Mystery of an Older Sister
description:
Scar of the Doll is an original psycho-suspense Visual Novel produced by Child-Dream in 1998, when became an exceptional hit. With its psychologically compelling horror elements and highly dramatic scenario, the game became a hot topic of discussion, including a feature in a mystery magazine, becoming a pioneer in the indie adventure genre.

This 2022 remake completely overhauls the original game's visuals. New content for the second half of the story has been added. In addition, a zapping scenario from different sub-character's points of view has been introduced.

name: Aren't You Overcompensating for Something?
description:
I can't stop my mind from coming up with new ideas.

Constantly, be it during work or while trying to sleep, I have to stop what I'm doing and note down the new ideas that came to me out of nowhere.

Restless creativity. Never-ending tension for not creating more. The feeling of 'I could be writing right now' follows me at all times.

So why is it that I can't write?

name: Mukon M
description: Sin descripción

name: Automatoys
description: Insert coin. Dispense ball. Tap, turn, tilt and spin the contraptions to help each ball hop and roll its way to victory. Each Automatoy is a unique, mechanical obstacle course.

name: Teacup
description:
Teacup is a short and wholesome narrative adventure game with a focus on exploration and non-linear progression.
You play as the titular Teacup, a shy and introverted young frog who loves drinking tea and reading. The day before she is to host a tea party at her house, she realizes she is completely out of tea, and thus must venture into the woods around her to find the herbs she needs to restock her pantry.
You are free to tackle the list of ingredients Teacup must gather in any order you wish. Find your own path through the world of Little Pond.
During your adventure you will meet the charming inhabitants of the forest. Some are talkative, some are grumpy, but all of them will lend you an ear on your adventure.
Most of the animals you meet will be glad to help Teacup… in exchange for a small favor or some help. Organize a (oddly shaped) market stall, win an underwater race and more!

name: Tuin
description: Plant seeds, pull weeds and sell vegetables - all while doing something else! Expand your garden more and more by buying new plots, installing irrigation systems, or fully automating your farm for maximum profit. What will your garden look like?

name: Romantic Date: The Perfect Boy
description: The excitement of the first date, the nerves, not knowing what will happen? it's a very special day.

name: Multi Race: Match the Car
description: What should I use today? A tank, or maybe a monster truck? What’s it like outside? Oh, it’s the North Pole. Then a snowmobile will do just fine! That’s basically what our game is all about. It may sound easy but, trust me… It’s not.

name: Timberman: The Big Adventure
description: Follow a lumberjack's story and join him on his way to help his bear friend reunite with family. Challenge the Evil Corp to rescue your friends and save the entire forest from the hands of industrialization.

name: Arcade Archives: Metro-Cross
description: "Metro-Cross" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1985. Avoid obstacles and slip zones, and make full use of skateboards and springboard to reach the goal in time.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Character Pack - Seija Kijin
description: The 4th additional character pack is already available! Introducing "Seija Kijin".

name: R-Type Final 2: DLC Set 7
description: Includes 2 new stages.

name: Thymesia: Cloud Version
description: Thymesia is a grueling action-RPG with fast-paced combat and an intricate plague weapon system. In a kingdom where death spreads, play as a mysterious character known by the code name "Corvus". Prey upon your enemies, wield the power of disease and find the truth in your own memories.

name: Why I was Born
description: "When I noticed, I was born on its own." This is a game that simulates the life of an ordinary man by rolling the ball.

name: Laboratory Rat Escape Simulator Pro
description: Free your ratty friends and escape the laboratory!

name: Hidden Cube World Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: The Ascent: Cyber Heist
description: Completed The Ascent but are itching for more? Cyber Heist is for you! Solo or in co-op with your friends, take on new challenging missions, explore brand new environments, fight your way against new enemies, and experience new ways of fighting using melee weapons!

name: Kach
description: On a task to find your sister, you find yourself exploring an old abandoned house. But you soon find out that things are not as they seem.

name: World of Talesworth: Idle MMO Simulator
description: Explore new lands, slay monsters, gather loot and level up in this idle MMO simulation experience. Packed with unique and meaningful upgrades, moments of discovery, and gaming nostalgia, World of Talesworth is an homage to all our favorite RPGs.

name: Tank Top Tactics
description: 1 vs 1 tactical turn-based battle game with tanks

name: Project: Swap
description: Project: Swap is just a simple, casual, non-competetive 1st person shooter that you can play with your friends. Find sessions or host them for your friends to join via steam. When you kill a person you teleport. Thats the basic idea of the game.

name: Pandea Stones
description: In the game you play the Pandean hero, Tin, which has a mission to save his planet from alien threat. You will be facing many obstacles thru different environments, where you will meet angry robots and funny looking animals.

name: Nature & Wildlife: Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Nature & Wildlife - Jigsaw Puzzle - Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Nature & Wildlife - Jigsaw Puzzle is designed for adults and for kids.

name: Soulforged
description:
Embark on a fantastic journey across a vast, unique world where your character will face many dangers and challenges. Collaborate with other players as you discover new technologies, build cities and infrastructure and venture into yet-unknown parts of the world.
Unique game-play experience where coordination is extremely rewarding, in a game that respects your time and you progress with just a few minutes a day spent in the game.

name: Kalinur
description: Kalinur is a mini metroidvania full of action and adventure. In it you will have to explore the entire castle in order to find and defeat a wizard named Kalinur, who used his power to leave the kingdom in a state of darkness and suffering. During this adventure you will have great challenges and rewards in order to bring peace back to the kingdom.

name: Pussies Wrestling Dicks
description: Pussies Wrestling Dicks is a fighting game where girls punch guys so hard they cum all over the fighting ring.

name: Mobmania
description: Defeat various bosses that get thrown at you using an arsenal of unique weapons, items, and character abilities. Can you survive the onslaught of monsters?

name: Keek
description: Keek is a pixel 2D platformer that you could use a special force to change the dimension of objects. Overcome obstacles, disable traps, collect items and face the final challenge.

name: Reed the Robotanist Plus
description: Reed the Robotanist is a fast-paced 3D platformer where you use the recoil of your gun to navigate and blast your way through numerous crazy levels, all to take down a megalomaniacal oil baron!

name: I Commissioned Some Bees 5
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 10 art pieces to choose from, and 1000+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Dash FPS
description: Dash FPS is a fun-filled Multiplayer First-Person Shooter with all kinds of new mechanics. Players have the option to utilize Jetpacks, Super speed, and much more. Play against our High Quality AI or battle against others on an online server.

name: Zumba Garden
description: Zumba Garden is a match-3 marble shooter puzzle game. Your goal is to protect your beautiful garden from evil golems. Special projectiles and other bonuses, which you upgrade by spending collected stars, are there to help.

name: Idle Campaign
description: Explore through Idle Campaign! A DnD inspired idle / incremental game about slaughtering enemies with a group of heroes. Once you finish one campaign you start another.

name: Altair Breaker
description: Enter the world of Altair and battle against the army of Laws left behind roaming around Vastus Isle in this Map-based Sword Fighting game. Team up with your friends and experience the feeling of transcendent sword fighting in VR. Climb, glide and collect resources to upgrade your character while playing with your friends.

name: Touhou: Lost Branch of Legend
description: Welcome to Eientei, combine multiple colors of mana to build your ideal deck, duel with gensokyo girls, and chase back the mysterious moon treasure. Also, enjoy the unpredictable Roguelike with fantasy Danmaku!

name: Space Leaper: Cocoon
description: Go on randomly generated adventures and discover the secrets hidden in the depths of the universe. But remember, you have to share them with me-ow! Complete the corresponding talent tree each season to claw your way up the rankings and unlock more ways to explore, then maybe you'll be on my level. Just maybe.

name: Monsters Loot Swag
description: Top-down, twin-stick, power-up collectathon shooter.

name: Slaycation Paradise
description: Are you tired of the same boring old vacations? Then boy have we got the tonic for you! Slaycation Paradise offers the ultimate in multi-dimensional apocalyptic tours. Slay away your worries with Twin-Stick action mixed with Tower Defence as you visit the end-of-world scenarios of your dreams!

name: Bounty of One
description: Survive to hundreds of bounty hunters and increase your reward until no one is strong enough to claim it! Bounty of One is a casual game with roguelite mechanics set in a fun western/fantasy setting. Choose your upgrades well and overcome your challengers.

name: Heart of Battle
description: Battle for love as a gladiator in this epic romance of swords and sandals! Win glory, victory, a better life, your freedom - and spark a revolution!

name: Red Matter 2
description: Red Matter 2 is an immersive, puzzle-adventure game that will transport you to the far reaches of space. Step into the shoes of Sasha, an agent awakened in a lunar base by an undercover operative and tasked with uncovering the secrets of the mysterious Red Matter.

name: The Complex: Found Footage
description:
Experience the liminal world of the backrooms through a VHS camera, immersing into a mysterious story and wandering the dream-like structures... Might there be something following you?

The Complex: Found Footage is a walking simulator with the world being viewed through a VHS camera. Uncover a mystery that lies in the world of "The Complex", though it may leave more questions rather than answers...

name: Pretty Girls Four Kings Solitaire
description: Let's test your thinking skills! Here comes "Solitaire" with the Calculation rules! Clear the game by placing all the cards on the table in the specified order! Clear each difficulty level to get various outfits for the cute girls and change them!

name: Eyes Over Us
description: Eyes Over Us is a surreal procedurally generated narrative strategy game were you will play as a Lovecraftian entity watching over two humans being experimented with. The power to change everything it's on your hands..wait? do you even have hands?...tentacles?

name: United Assault: Battle of the Bulge
description: An open world rogue lite FPS set in 1944's depiction of the Ardennes.

name: The Ascent: Cyber Edition
description:
The Ascent is a solo and co-op action RPG set in a cyberpunk world. The mega corporation that owns you and everyone, The Ascent Group, has just collapsed. Confusion and chaos ensue, security and order are in disarray, and without protection, everyone is left to fend for themselves. Stop gangs and hostile corporations from taking over and discover what really happened.

The Ascent: Cyber Edition includes:
- Base Game
- Steelbook
- 88 Pages Artbook
- Tuck-in Box

name: We Are OFK
description: Start a band in this dreamy, musical TV show from indie pop cuties OFK. Cry, skate, date, and run for your life in 5 interactive music videos, across a heartfelt story of what you risk to chase your dreams.

name: Train Ride Simulator
description: Discover the best train simulator!

name: Thymesia
description: Thymesia is a grueling action-RPG with fast-paced combat and an intricate plague weapon system. In a kingdom where death spreads, play as a mysterious character known by the code name "Corvus". Prey upon your enemies, wield the power of disease and find the truth in your own memories.

name: Cursed to Golf
description: Cursed to Golf is a golf-like adventure where every shot counts. Players are tasked with making it out of Golf Purgatory to become a Golfing Legend. With insane hazards, otherworldly power-ups and tons of replayability, will you make it back alive or will you forever be… Cursed to Golf!?

name: Quake Champions
description: The fast, skill-based arena-style competition that turned the original Quake games into multiplayer legends is making a return with Quake Champions.

name: Stay at Home
description:
"...We can't be friends. Because we're the same person."

Your future self wants to stop you from going to school.

name: Watching Blade Runner on a Rainy Night
description: An autobiographical Bitsy game about real and artificial experiences.

name: Voxel Doom
description: A mod that replaces 2d characters and props from Doom with fully 3d voxel-based models. For the GZDoom source port.

name: Don't Give Up on Me!
description:
Don't Give Up on Me! is a romance-comedy visual novel about a simple love confession going wrong in the most unpredictable, absurd and insane ways ever imagined. Experience five different days in which Yorokobi Akihiko tries to confess to his crush, each one with their own plot and shenanigans.

In the end, will Akihiko manage to confess?

name: Dagon: The Little Glass Bottle
description: Join Captain William Jones and his party of men on a treasure hunt adventure! The Little Glass Bottle is the second official DLC for Dagon, based on the first surviving story by the master of weird fiction, written when he was… 7 years old! Take some rest from cosmic horror and eldritch underwater beings and experience the other, more humorous, side of young H. P. Lovecraft!

name: Days Before the Festival
description: A fan made Genshin Impact dating simulator.

name: Boyfriend Dungeon: Secret Weapons
description: The Secret Weapons DLC comes with a brand-new dunj, three new weapons-slash-love interests, and more.

name: Impossible Dungeon
description: Sin descripción

name: Cuties Hacked: Oh No Someone Stole My Photos!
description: Cuties Hacked is a new spin on the classic arcade formula of Xonix, that rewards your reflexes and skills with sets of beautifully crafted arts featuring some of the hottest girls you have ever seen.

name: Little Journeys
description:
Little Journeys is a casual, action/ arcade game with a 3D low-poly graphics and physics engine behind. With a simple two-finger touch control, the player flies a blimp with the task of transporting passengers here and there. There are dozens of fairly short missions grouped into levels. Each mission map is designed from scratch. There are a number of customizations, trophies, and challenges included. The game is free to play.

LLittle Journeys, in short, is a fantastic blend of two aspects. One, the zen feeling and serenity of flying freedom. Two, the great challenge of piloting an unusual aircraft.

name: Kruger 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Droid Trivia
description: Droid Trivia is fun for everyone! Challenge your friends or family to over 800 questions spread over 15 categories! Go head to head in local couch multiplayer or play against the AI. Choose to Play 4 or 8 rounds or just the individual rounds you like.

name: Smash Boats: Waterlogged Edition
description: LET'S GO SMASH! Bash, crash and smash through schools of enemies and horrendous hazards to collect star to become the ULTIMATE SMASHER!

name: Nomori
description: Nomori is a mind-bending puzzle game where you need to control time and space to journey through a shattered spirit world. Take shortcuts through portals, rotate your perspective, and control the flow of time to move forward, whichever way that is.

name: The Hippo G
description: Sin descripción

name: Underworld Re: Card
description: Japanese Anime Style X Roguelike Deck-building CCGReborn into Underworld As A Hero!"Underworld Re: Card" is a game that combines deck-building and Rogue-like elements. Players are reborn into various races to fight and explore in the fantasy world.

name: Climb Challage: Castle
description: The player needs to climb the castle by clinging and climbing the walls.

name: Galaxy Survivors
description: Shoot alien invaders, upgrade your ship, level up your weapons and save planets to defend against the invasion. Choose your favorite between the different unlockable ships and buy perks between your runs to ensure victory. After you triumph, hunt for achievements and ascend to save more universes

name: Termalloc
description: Connect terminals to the server. Securities are coming. Keep yourself safe.

name: Project Possession
description: This project is the result of a 2 week internal Game Jam done by a small, passionate and dedicated team of devs from Colombia. We used this as an opportunity to challenge ourselves into creating something fun, simple and polished.

name: Midnight School Walk
description: In the summer of third year of high school, the movie club which he belongs in crisis of survival! Have make movie until Cultural festival, if don’t make impress the audience, movie club will be forced to abolish. The cast of the movie is what a girl! Will he be able to keep the movie club alive ?

name: Students of Psionic Power
description: "Students of Psionic Power" is RPG based typing game. You can create your own party members (Can input name, can choose portrait for all of 5 members in ally party). 20 portraits (10 school boys and 10 school girls) are included for character creation.

name: Kirby's Dream Buffet
description: Hungry for some 4-player Kirby fun? Race through delicious obstacle courses, collect the most strawberries, and thwart your competition using familiar abilities.

name: Guardian
description: Guardian is a rogue-like, 2D platformer set in the fantastic land of Erstwhile for the annual LARP event. Our heroine, Aria, dons the identity of Arcas and sets out on a quest to rescue the Greek Pantheon! With clever platforming and careful upgrades, help Aria achieve her goal and return home.

name: Dream Magic Will
description: In a magical forest, animals began to occupy the territory of other animals for unknown reasons. In order to find out the truth, a team guarding the forest was born!Build a guard force to prevent enemy invasion and explore the truth of the forest!

name: Dyna Bomb 2
description: Jack and Ela are on vacation on a beautiful tropical island. Unaware of DR.Brutus they sip fruit juices and talk about their past adventures. They are interrupted by Dr. Brutus's voice. A loud explosion destroys the kiosk where they were relaxing and so they decide to make the bad guy pay for it. Thus begins their new adventure and You will be the protagonist. Choose one of the two heroes or both if you prefer to play with a friend. Fly and shoot bombs across 8 different beautiful and colorful levels. Discover secret levels and find the way to the secret world. Buy new weapons and other types of upgrades that will help You on your adventure. Defeat all of Dr.Brutus' followers and help Jack and Ela to clean up the wonderful island they are on.

name: XenoTown
description: A small RPG where you play as an alien in disguise, on a mission to brainwash the humans of Earth, one person at a time. Join up with an Earth child and a germaphobic toilet on your quest to control the planet!

name: Natsu no Kanata: Beyond the Summer
description:
A text adventure game depicting girls traveling the world to the end.

You found an old computer which can connect to talk with strange garl you have never met.

The girl's name is Natsuno.
She said said to be traveling alone in a world collapsed by a pandemic.

But in the world, you know, there is no pandemic or social collapse.
Where is the world she is in and why are the calls connected each other?
As you talk to Natsuno and watch over her journey, you will explore the mysteries of the end of the world.

name: This Rain Will Never End
description: You are in a noir adventure game where you will play a cat detective who needs to investigate the suicide of the Mayor of Sunny city. Suddenly the rain started to drop endlessly and no one knows why.

name: Self-Delusion
description: Self-Delusion is a first-person survival horror. The game based on an original setting of Slavic myths. The Player will faces with such unique enemies like: Kolobok, Leshy, Boggart, Lapot and other characters of grim tales.

name: Neodash
description: Drift at full speed across gaps, traps, and neon-drenched environments that react to a captivating soundtrack. Build and play community-made tracks, or dive straight into a spectacular campaign.

name: City Block Builder
description: Experience a beautiful tycoon management style game that allows you to build your own business empire in Los Angeles during the 1950s era. Manage businesses ranging from Movie Theaters to Jazz Clubs to Restaurants and more!

name: Lost and Hound
description: Lost and Hound is a scent hound adventure following the reluctant yet strong-willed Corgi, Biscuit. Hunt down criminals, help people that are in trouble or lost, solve mysteries and save lives in this blind-accessible canine story.

name: Way of the Hunter: Hunter's Pack
description:
The Way of the Hunter Hunter's Pack:
• a shotgun, with engravings.
• a paintjob for the Car.
• a big wooden carved mouflon statue for the lodge.

This DLC is also part of the Map Pack 1 and the Elite Edition.

name: Usemono Terminal
description: A puzzle escape room game to reunite lost items with their owners.

name: Being Home Alone With You is Worse Than Death
description:
Includes three games - Home Postmortem Edition, Alone With You, and Worse Than Death

- Home: Postmortem Edition : The complete, original indie horror classic, rebuilt for Nintendo Switch
- Alone With You : Experience more than a dozen missions, including lush agroponic installations, vast research labs, and the eerily-quiet cabins of your former colleagues
- Worse Than Death : Action-adventure gameplay that sees you crawling under objects, vaulting over obstacles, and racing for the nearest hiding spot to stay safe

name: Asphalt 9: Legends - Turbo Summer Racing Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeons Adventurer
description: Sin descripción

name: Pocket Academy 3
description:
Your favorite dream school simulator is back and better than ever! Introducing: The super fun school festival!
Build facilities and create a great school environment. Set up classrooms, a cafeteria...and a counseling room! (A little nerve-wracking for students to get called in there!)
Place compatible facilities together to create popular spots which will make your school really stand out. As the school's popularity and rep go up, enrollment applications will flood in.

name: Hunt: Showdown - Reap What You Sow
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary tool: Daughter of Decay, Bountiful (Berthier Mle 1892), First Fruits (Bow), and The Scion (Knuckle Knife).

name: Cheesequest
description: A dark card game where you try to eat the cheese.

name: Redhot Rabbit
description: 1922...The Big Apple...Mugsy's turf got plucked by a gang of trouble boys. The ever-lovin' jazz rabbit is gonna jump on heads and clip those goons. He'll bop his way to the biggest boss and take back what's his or get zotzed, ya' follow? Soundtrack is the bee's knees - truly hep and jake.

name: Starcube MMO
description: an open world subculture urban MMORPG what kills the bad orcs that invaded Sun Street, A city of dreams and happiness

name: 69 Natasha Hot
description: 69 Natasha Hot - is a game that contains elements of a novel and a memory puzzle. You meet a beautiful girl who is ready to show you around and tell you the secret of the local cuisine. Solve memory puzzles and get rewards you're sure to love.

name: Catto Pew Pew!
description: Blast your friends into the horizon in this chaotic arena shooter!

name: The Perfect Garden
description: Try this simulation-casual game of The Perfect Garden , which gives you the opportunity to feel on your own skin what it's like to plant strawberries or clean up after you've had guests. Your mission is to do all the garden work on time and very good!

name: Escape
description: Run to score, jump to survive! That's all there is to it. Go as far as you can go!

name: Timberman VR
description: Timberman, the devilishly addictive retro-style arcade video game goes 3D and beyond. It’s now available in VR! Take a deep dive into a game that is easy to learn but not-so-easy to master. Discover whole heaps of fun in a brand new type of reality - a virtual reality!

name: Way of the Hunter: Elite Edition
description:
The Elite Edition includes the base game as well as the following extras items:
- Way of the Hunter: Season Pass.
The Way of the Hunter Season Pass includes two new region DLCs. + The Way of the Hunter Hunter's Pack

name: Little League World Series Baseball 2022
description: Little League World Series Baseball 2022 captures the fun and fundamentals of Little League in a new unique way: pick your team, power-up your stats, and knock it out of the park to become a Little League All-Star.

name: Rollerdrome
description: Rollerdrome is a third person action shooter that seamlessly blends high octane, visceral combat with fluid movement and tricking mechanics into one complementary and challenging whole, to create an original adrenaline-pumping shooter experience like no other.

name: Way of the Hunter
description: Become the new owner of a hunting lodge nestled among gorgeous habitats and rich animal populations. Explore vast open world environments and hunt with a premium selection of firearms. Enjoy the perfect hunt on your own or with friends in co-op.

name: Summoners War: Chronicles
description: Summoners War: Chronicles is a real-time MMORPG. There are 3 characters that players can choose to play from, each player can eventually get support from up to 3 summons.

name: Neon Abyss: Chrono Trap
description: The Chrono Trap DLC brings a new Endless Mode and the Titan, Chronos, to Neon Abyss.

name: The Doll Beneath
description: Awakened from a deep slumber, six students find themselves trapped inside an abandoned research facility, otherwise known as the "Losinglight". Delve deep into the trenches of the black eclipse, and search for a way out. Just remember, you're not alone.

name: Snow Scout
description: In this exploration adventure on skis, which is experienced in virtual reality, you start a one-week stint as a volunteer for the Snow Scouts. Fixing up a remote ski resort, all alone high in the mountains, nothing can go wrong - right?

name: Blossom Tales 2: The Minotaur Prince
description:
The Minotaur King has returned...and it's all your fault! Lily's back for a new "classic" action-adventure set hundreds of years after The Sleeping King!

Grandpa’s latest tale takes you on a journey through haunted forests, pirate shores, and other mysterious lands across a vast open-world! Charming towns, terrible enemies, tricky puzzles, and powerful weapons await you.

Enjoy a “story within a story” as Grandpa narrates exciting moments throughout Lily’s incredible adventure.

Will you help Lily defeat the Minotaur King and save her brother?

name: Frail Hearts: Versicorae Domlion
description: An old-school JRPG with a deep and mysterious storyline placed in a fictional dark city of Gris. Explore the story of four troubled souls and kill the abominations that threaten the existence of reality itself.

name: Platformer Execute
description: This is a puzzle game platform, focused on completing each level using programming.

name: Regiments
description: Regiments is a Real-Time Tactics set in Germany 1989. The Cold War has gone hot, and the inferno is raging. Lead your Regiment through the fires of conflict and the fog of war. Break through the lines, call in artillery, maneuver, feign retreats, stage defenses, counter-attack. Do not relent.

name: Manufactoria 2022
description: Manufactoria 2022 is a constructive puzzle game about pushing robots around.

name: Cahertis
description:
Build your reputation with the people of Athara, maintain your gear, enchant it, and recruit companions to fight alongside you. Refine your talents in various masteries (fishing, lock picking, herbalism, pickpocketing…) and develop your combat skills in a turn-based strategy game called Cahertis.

In a medieval fantasy universe, play as Frey, a young recruit in a corrupt guard and investigate Antus. Recruit companions, rise in rank in the guard, and unravel the mysteries of Athara.

name: Monster Breakout
description: Monster Breakout is an NES inspired action game from Wokoha.

name: Serena
description:
"I wish she could remember our days together."

Serena is a short story where we meet a white-haired girl and, in turn, discover that she needs our blood to survive.

Why does she seem so sad? Will I be able to do anything for her?

name: TondaSan
description: Tonda's table clean and grease-free. Your main task is to chop chlebíček (which is a traditional Czech open-faced sandwich). But be careful, don't hit the bomb!

name: The Pac-Man Brothers
description: The Pac-Man Brothers is an unofficial sequel/reboot of the original Pac-Man games in the arcade. New things include procedurally generated levels, simultaneous multiplayer, a new dodge roll move, and more!

name: Roomba Out!
description:
What's more annoying than the noise made by a Roomba? NOTHING! It's never a Shiba Inu's responsibility to withstand such an artificial "idiot."

Because you know what... they can ONLY turn RIGHT! So loud and unintelligent, the robot doesn't deserve to stay at my house. It's time to throw it out.

Roomba OUT! is a strategy game where the player needs to control the Shiba Inu to "guide" the Roomba out of the house, based on the fact that the idiot robot can only turn right when facing obstacles.

name: CrossGunr
description: CrossGunr is a bullet hell inspired caravan shmup for the pico-8, made for the Lazy Devs Basic Shmup Game Jam, and with the help of Lazy Devs Academy Tutorials.

name: Déjà Drift
description: Stuck alone on a retro-futuristic racetrack, your only choice is to drift. Earn as many points as possible before time runs out, and then do it again and again... But wait, there is someone else here? And why does their driving seem so familiar?

name: Super Ball Mania
description: Super Ball Mania is an action-packed minigame-based party game. Compete against your friends to earn the most points by the end of the game, and become a Super Ball Maniac.

name: While I'm Still Your Eyes
description:
A game about emotional abuse.

You are back at the waterfront. They are spilling everything out onto you. Drink up bitch. Good girl. For now, I am still your eyes.

name: Shinigami Soul Agency
description:
You were just a child when you first started seeing Shinigami—supernatural beings whose duty is to collect the souls of the fallen. Once you reached adulthood, your rare talent got you scouted to work at a secret government agency monitoring their activity in Japan. Unfortunately, your office life consists of nothing but tedious paperwork and endless meetings… until one night, you come face-to-face with a ghost—a dangerous apparition that only appears if a soul isn't successfully retrieved.

Soon, reports of these hauntings come pouring in from across the country, and you're assigned to a secret task force with the three top Shinigami to investigate. As if that wasn't overwhelming enough, your heart stops when the agency director gives you some chilling news—your own soul is scheduled to be collected in just 30 days.

name: Darkdire: The Advanced Set - Greencastle Expansion
description: The kingdom of Union Port long ago built a large stone wall circling the kingdom, but the wall wasn't built to keep out invaders. It was built to seal off the center of the kingdom. Anyone that knows why it was built isn't revealing any secrets.

name: Rollance: Adventure Balls
description: Sin descripción

name: Madness in Square Garden
description: Arrange a random set of blocks to get the most out of your garden in 30 days and rack up a high score. Till, plant, water, harvest…but keep an eye out for snakes!

name: Tricky Keys 2
description:
Replay and reestablish your connection to the world of Tricky Keys in this old-school puzzle platforming adventure!

Equip your AI assistant with the right combination of instructions and collaborate to solve each level, avoiding the hazards along the way.

name: Reach the Ocean
description: Reach the Ocean or defeat the Oraclepus. Its your call.

name: MultiVersus: Season 1
description: Season 1 contains a new battle pass, along with new cosmetics, modes, and characters including Rick, Morty, Black Adam, and Stripe.

name: Webgeon Speedrun Edition
description: Webgeon Speedrun Edition is a Arcade Speedrun Game, You have to be fast, yes you have to be fast, Can you finish 20 levels in the fastest time?

name: Puppy Balloon Ride
description: Puppy Balloon Ride is a fun game where you must navigate the skies, avoid storms, collect treats and guide Puppy through the maze worlds to get him home.

name: FMV Comedy Bundle
description: Wales Interactive is proud to offer the FMV Comedy Bundle featuring Who Pressed Mute on Uncle Marcus?, Five Dates in one bundle!

name: MoonPong: Tales of Epic Lunacy
description: A psychedelic Roguelite Pong'em up where you go to rescue the Moon.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Dreamcatcher 2
description: Play solitaire and explore the secrets of the world of dreams! Master the art of solitaire!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Beach Season 2
description: Jigsaw Puzzle: Beach Season 2 is a fun puzzle game with 500 photos, each an idea of how to have a fantastic time this summer

name: Girl and Demon 1
description: Experience a hardcore dungeon crawling RPG. Satisfy the craving for high numbers and complex status effects. Focus on combat and variety of fighting styles.

name: Pets in Action Bundle
description: Pets in Action includes four CUTE indie games from QUByte Interactive. Dive into this bundle to get in love with all the pets!

name: Royal Roads 3 Portal
description: A fascinating journey through the fabulous Kingdoms. Join forces of people and wizards, save the kingdoms!

name: My Cat Girl Lover
description: Zirui, who lives alone, takes in a dying black cat. One rainy night the black cat suddenly 'bad-mouthed' Zirui. The next day, the black cat disappears and at the same time, a cat lady who resembles the black cat appears in Zirui's bed ......

name: Escape It
description: A man has been trapped in a house. He doesn't remember anything, but he knows that he should leave the house as soon as possible. He encounters many unique challenges, which require his brain to work at its best. Will he be able to make it out? Or is he going to stay in the house forever?

name: Cyber Manhunt: A Company Man of Titan
description: It combines all the mini-games in Cyber Manhunt. Let's just break out from a tangled web of the Story, and enjoy the pleasure of mini-games. Also there is a leaderboard in the game, and let's fight for becoming the strongest company man of Titan.

name: Spectral Showdown
description: Spectral Showdown is a party brawl game where you fight your friends, family or greatest enemies to the death. Possess creatures at your will and use their abilities to help you.

name: Twistingo: Collector's Edition
description: Play a variety of puzzles and games, including clever blends of hidden objects, bingo, and marble-popping. Each step gets you closer to recovering the missing artifacts and restoring the island to its natural beauty. Are you up to the challenge?

name: Idle Baker Boss
description: Grow your bakery franchise and manage bakeries in this cute idle tycoon game

name: World Serpent
description: Take control of giant snake monster consuming everything in its way! Nowhere is safe from you on this planet! Not even in space.

name: Dark Blue Warriorr
description: A portal from Deep Blue appeared, and the protagonist of the warrior decided to walk into the portal to find out. Come on, warrior.

name: Round Invaders Rush
description: Sin descripción

name: Eremidia: Archivist's Curse
description: Archivist's Curse brings you into an otherworldly harbor of knowledge: The Great Library, although unfortunately, you ended up in the dangerous section of the complex called Hall of Pawnsmoor.

name: River Raid 3D
description: You fly an airplane over a river and shoot down enemy ships, helicopters, balloons. Don't forget to refuel. If you shoot down all the gas stations, you may not reach the finish line. If you score enough points, you get an additional plane. Minimal interface and understandable for any language.

name: Who is the Red Queen?
description: Alice, Alice, the Red Queen is missing. The queen has been dismembered and Alice must find all her pieces. A horror-fantasy yuri visual novel filled with death, love, and forgotten memories.

name: Dark Swords Firelink
description: Dark Swords: Fire link is a 2D metroidvania game with a large locations to explore, fight with a lot creatures and epic bosses, and greats skills and power-ups to acquire. Have some of the better features that defines the 8/16-bits era, games like Ninja Gaiden, Super Ghost and Ghouls, Megaman, Castlevania and Super Metroid. Also, it gets inspired by the Dark Souls series, Hollow Knight and Blasphemous.

name: Enjoy
description: A very different kind of destruction game where you can build, knock, break, crush and destroy anything you want

name: Gears of Phantasm: Destiny Tailored - Act I
description: A classic story with fun exploration, an RPG like nothing you remembered. Familiar gameplay with new twists, building your Warriors into Legends.

name: CycloHex
description: CycloHex is a twist on the classic board game Hex. Despite it's simple rules, there's a world of strategy in CycloHex and countless ways to out-think your opponent! Play against your friends locally or online, or take on the built-in AI!

name: Spark the Electric Jester 3
description:
Continuing directly from where Spark the Electric Jester 2 left off, Join Spark on his mission to overthrow his rival once again. Blaze through fast action packed stages and experience a new and improved combat system.

The gameplay is a mix of action and platforming in a clever way, taking elements from many games of both genres, you are able to find powers that change the way you play, enjoy great freedom of movement, discover many different ways to beat each stage, and ways to do it faster.

name: Fashion Police Squad
description: Fashion Police Squad is a humorous retro FPS where you fight against fashion crime using attire enhancing weaponry. Clean the streets off of socks in sandals as Sergeant Des, and experience a single player story full of fabulous characters, dazzling encounters and fierce runway shows!

name: WoMen in Science
description: Build and customize your farm. Join a community of epic scientists. Automate tasks, program robots and race drones. Will you be able to maximize the productivity of your farm without harming the environment?

name: Nukalypse Zombie Survival
description: Fight off the horde of zombies coming your way with any means necessary! The rounds are endless,and the zombies keep on coming...

name: Oceanarium World
description: Build your ultimate aquarium and water park! Manage marine park and make it successful by building aquariums and attractions. Display beautiful, rare or monstrous fishes that your visitors demand and make them satisfied.

name: Noelle's Forest Adventure
description:
Noelle's forest adventure is a standalone adventure about NOELLE.

It takes place in the light world and it is about Noelle going out to visit her sister and gift her a Gladious. She explores FARAWAY FOREST, a forest filled with dangerous insects to fight in Deltarune style combat with a light world twist, as well as traces from memories in the past from all sorts of people. Can you reach Dess and give her Noelle's gift? The game has 4 endings to obtain, depending on your actions!

Enjoy an OMORI inspired mini adventure featuring Noelle! (This game can be played without having played OMORI, it isn't a crossover with OMORI)

name: Occult Case Files: Case One
description: Occult Case Files is an homage to the point n' clicks on the NES like Uninvited, Shadowgate and Deja-Vu. This demo was made over the course of 2 months and if reception is well we'll go full steam ahead and make it into a fully fledged game (After The Third Shift of course)

name: Thirty Monsters Challenge
description: The mission was simple: make a map with thirty monsters in it. In the end, sixty-four of them were made, for your personal enjoyment.

name: Ascent
description: Crashed on a desolate but mysterious planet you find yourself eye to eye with an ancient civilisation. Explore the planet, find powerful upgrades, and uncover its secrets.

name: RetroDoge: Saving Elon
description: RetroDoge is a play to earn token that includes a classic pixel style game that showcases rex, our hero, as he fights tooth and nail to rescue his master from the god of scams. with villain's like Retro Ape and 8bit snake, enduring harsh, unforgiving terrains including the classic forest and castle! Rex will pound on them all with cool and hilarious weapons like a rubber chicken or Nerf style weaponry, lasers and more!

name: Get Home Safe
description: A tired man was on his way back to the river. However, he had to go home alone in a desolate atmosphere.

name: Isaiah 24:4-6
description: A curse consumes the earth; its people must bear their guilt.

name: Fairy Card Rogue
description: A single-player deck-building roguelite. Lily White picks her favorite cards... and charges in to raid the card market?! No two runs will ever be the same. Keep trying over and over again, until you finally reach the card master!

name: Bangungot
description:
Bangungot is a short adventure horror game following the main character, Jake. One night, Jake was riding a train home when it suddenly crashed. Now, he wakes up trapped in a mysterious island with no idea where to go.

What will he discover in this place?

What will happen to him now?

name: Nik and Kit Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Monument Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: The Jumping Noodles: Turbo
description:
Join BIG N on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!
Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: MyaoSoft Garake Collection
description: "Legendary games are back!"The MYAOSOFT GAME COLLECTION includes all the games that have been released on cell phones in the past.

name: Tump Jump
description: Sin descripción

name: Black Market of Bulletphilia: 100th Black Market
description: This time, Marisa Kirisame goes out alone to investigate (and collect). It is a game in which Marisa is the main character. Collect new cards and repeatedly challenge stages while conquering stages that develop at high speed and at random. Each play is short, and you play repeatedly to solve the anomalies.

name: Street Hero
description: A crazy fun fast-paced explosive open-world superhero game made by one person. Play as a powerful superhero with ultimate combat skills, speed, and strength.

name: Konsui Fighter
description:
Crash! That was last thing Professor Ayumu Tsuburaya heard before waking up in the hospital. While in a coma, he struggles to remember what led to his condition. Searching his psyche for answers, the beings that make up the fabric of his personality begin to emerge, locked in conflict.

Konsui Fighter is a hand-drawn animated fighting game. The game features 10 playable characters, online/local multiplayer, arcade mode, character tutorials, and an in-depth story mode where players can embark on Ayumu's journey and fight to regain his lost memories.

As the Tournament of the Mind begins, will Ayumu's mind regain order, or will it remain forever lost in chaos?

name: Amorphous Euphoria
description: Amorphous Euphoria is a random, chaotic, and artsy Doom project with plenty to admire and varied challenges to overcome. Amorphous Euphoria is also Doom Universe's first original community project.

name: Happy Saint Sheol
description: Two thousand years ago, the Pestis Disaster swept through the land, corrupting all living things and making it too difficult to live on the land. Having touched the darkest darkness the world has seen, one must now face the dazzling light. Thus I pose this question. Whose wings did I see that day?

name: Pokémon Eon Guardians
description: Pokémon Eon Guardians is a Pokémon fangame developed in RPG Maker XP using the Pokémon Essentials v19.1 starter kit and MKXP. The game was created with Gen 4 graphics and includes all Pokémon from the first four generations! Jump into an unknown adventure full of challenges, secrets to discover and a lot of fun! Explore the Terre Region in over 50 hours of gameplay, earn the region's eight badges, and face the Titanium Plateau!

name: The Polaroid Killer
description: A deranged killer with a camera torments a detective until he's unable to distinguish reality from nightmares.

name: Reprobate
description:
The city is full of people to watch and you love to watch them.

Don't you want to privately talk to people who have similar "interests" as you, without probes reading your mind? That's what Incog-sym chat is for.

name: A New Kaizo Era
description: A New Kaizo Era is a kaizo mod for New Super Mario Bros. Wii.

name: Notes From Province
description: Dive into a deep Open World that rewards exploration. Solve clever puzzles with lateral thinking, and engage in unique, story-driven boss battles. Then take a break. Furnish your home, fish a little, and chill with your eccentric neighbors.

name: Sex Adventures: Swingers Gym
description: A visual novel about a hot couple trying a private gym. Everything takes a turn when a daring blonde starts hitting on the girlfriend.

name: Nonozle
description: A number logic puzzle game. Solve nonograms to form pixel-art images. Features 200 hand-made puzzles.

name: Graveyard Keeper
description: An interesting synthetic casual game

name: Breakthrough
description: Breakthrough is an hardcore roguelike-shooter with high risk/rewards mechanics. Help Clunky see the sunset behind the mountain by fighting tireless monsters. Both balanced and very difficult, Breakthrough will conquer the heart of thoses seeking a great challenge.

name: Furry Sex: Poker
description: Furry Sex: Poker is a dating-sim-styled game where you have to beat your opponents in poker.

name: Protocol Xeno
description: This hectic twin-stick shooter will force you to balance blowing up massive alien warships and growing your monumental arsenal. How long can you survive in this galactic brawl?

name: Yandere Goddess: A Snatch Made in Heaven
description: Every man's dream is to be eternally bound to a beautiful, loving Goddess (according to this goddess at least!) Forget about the women of this world and devote yourself entirely to a Yandere Goddess who will love you forever!

name: Bananner Nababber
description: It's a nice sunny day in Neo-Tartaria and ruthless killer Harry Pippels and his pretend friend Humpty-Ho are guzzling down some sprutzels and racking up a debt at the bar. Their life of luxury is soon interrupted however when the Elder Demon's diabolical crypto schemes threaten the lands.

name: Rasetsu Fumaden
description: In the Edo period, in a world where demons, humans, and gods exist together, Rasetsu Raki, a princess of the demon tribe who possesses great sealing powers, helps people and defeats the enemies by skillfully using various 'sword techniques' and 'barrier techniques'.

name: Fog
description: Your new indie rouge-lite addiction. Battle through the nine levels of hell in a psychedelic watercolor painted world. Unleash your creativity to create a character build that will take you all the way to the gates of heaven.

name: Gorilla Soccer
description: A new type of VR sports competitive game. Your can play football (soccer) as a gorilla! The locomotion is inspired by gorilla tag. You can run, jump, and hit the ball using only your hands. You can not only play with bots, but also play with other players.

name: Arali
description: Fight your way through hordes of enemies, rescue the five forest spirits and bring them back to their tree, and lift the curse plaguing the Enchanted Forest!

name: Path of Destruction
description: Face other opponents inside a unknow labyrinth. Follow the path to no where or destroy the walls to give a end for your enemies. Path of Destruction is a top-down 2D multiplayer PVP focused game.

name: Le Chat Fonce: Gnome Cafe
description:
Delicious Gnome Coffee? The Famous Tim's is back in town and our friend Chat Fonce doesn't have the money to buy it!

Help our friend to find some coins and buy some delicious delicacy!

name: Star Revenge 4.9: Adulterated Reality
description: Sin descripción

name: My Zombie World
description: Welcome to My Zombie World, the hilarious and scary game that lets you create your own zombie empire and conquer the world! Use the best crazy strategy to infect all humans, evolve their brains, and build your unstoppable undead army.

name: Monsterra
description:
Monsterra NFT Game is a multi-chain game run on BNB, Avalanche and Terra networks inspired by the Axie Infinity game's pet world and the gameplay in Clash of Clan or Boom Beach of Supercell.

The game set foot in a fictional world and revolves around farming, property building, and battling other lands with the magical creatures named Mongen. The design of Monsterra combines the free-to-play and free-to-earn model, which allows millions of gaming enthusiasts fun and profit with no initial investment.

name: Coffee Break: A sip away from doom
description: In a tedious day, Oliver finishes his best invention yet: A SubAtomic coffee machine that is to make the perfect coffee. But a problem emerged when the perfect coffee was so good it blew up the machine and ruptured timespace. Now, Oliver has to retrieve the pieces of his machine that are scattered through the multiverse. Follow Oliver in his adventure through the dimensions in search of the perfect coffee! Meet various worlds with incredible art, charismatic characters and challenging puzzles!

name: Arcade Archives: Gun & Frontier
description: Gun & Frontier is a shooting game released by TAITO in 1990. Pilot the earth's latest fighter plane, Desperado, against the space pirates, Wild Lizard!

name: Cyber Protocol Prologue
description: Demanding challenges, new traps and mechanics are easy to grasp but hard to master. Find a way to gather all of the coins and become the best hacker. Enjoy the 8 bit graphics of Cyber Protocol. The neon lighting, simple shapes and overall cyberpunk aesthetic, will guide you on your path.

name: Verlore Tyd en Drome Bundle
description: Two abstract, ethereal worlds collide in this mysterious bundle, prepare yourself to be taken to 2 distinct realms that blend interpretive design and human curiosity into a unique combination of platforming, puzzles and challenges.

name: Taco Fun
description: Taco Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Arcade Waifu
description: A relaxing puzzle game with girls who love games.

name: Gigant
description: Gigant is a horror point and click adventure game. You must escape from the terror of the unknown creature 'Gigant' and the conflict that revolves around it. Use your reflexes to dodge the creature's attack. Combine and use tools to overcome the given challenges.

name: Monster Cards
description: Bring your original deck of cards and play against everyone!

name: Tiles II
description: Tiles II is a battle royale in which you must conquer as much territory as possible. Challenge your friends through many game modes and a great customization of gameplay, as well as a map creator to make your own arenas !

name: Legeno Slayer
description: Use and combine powerful weaponsDefeat all the endless waves of enemies.And become a Regeno Slayer.

name: Bomb Viking
description: It is a run game. You must use a mouse and keyboard. Run for a high score

name: What If George Washington Was a Girl?
description: An historical epic following Georgia Washington in her attempt to stop the dark musician Mozart from destroying Antarctica.

name: Space Tail: Lost in the Sands
description: "Lost in The Sands" is a free prologue to the puzzle adventure platformer - "Space Tail: Every Journey Leads Home". A story about a dog called Bea, who survived one-way flight to space and who discovers new worlds, meets alien species and tries to find her way home.

name: Party Bunch
description: Psychological and fun game with lots of game modes for a big group of friends!

name: Hellfire
