description: In this classic arcade-like game from 1984, take on the role of the mythical hero Ulysses as he performs a series of tasks, set by the gods to prove his worthiness. Test your might against the slopes of Mount Olympus, the Gorgon, Minotaurs, and other monsters.

name: Re;quartz Reido
description: Taking place in a different universe from the original Re;quartz, Reido, in turn, takes place in a different world, where the new protagonist, Yuni, belongs to an organization of people with supernatural powers. When he moves from European headquarters to a branch in the Far East, he is attacked by something and dies. Unmask the liars and choose which side of their faces to see while trying to find out who your killer was.

name: Coloring Pixels: Bakery Pack
description: This Bakery-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! All pictures depict various baked goods or scenes of bakeries!

name: Restaurant Manager Simulator
description: Try Restaurant Manager Simulator... As the leading person of the restaurant, you have to maintain a balance and harmonybetween all the stuff. Your job is a hard and very responsible one.

name: Bell Kingdom
description: Bell Kingdom is a 3D platformer, jump inside of dreams and explore the weird worlds within.

name: War Dots
description: Fast paced tug-of-war auto-battler. Unleash hordes of soldiers and wreak havoc upon your enemies!

name: Story Walker
description: "Story Walker" is a leisure collection puzzle solving Chinese game. The game tells the story of the new book wizard entering the book world to collect elves.Players need to control the hostess to explore in the scene, and have a small journey with the game characters.

name: Survivor of the Journey
description: Survivos of the Journey is a survival game with rogue-like elements Survive in countless fantasy monsters Grow faster than the enemy that comes and knock them down Survive to the end and defeat the boss. Failed? Use your stuff to be strong. Can't you? Let's try our luck this time.

name: OrbiTank
description: OrbiTank is a local-multiplayer tank game with a fresh spin on projectile combat. Use gravity to your advantage to shoot your shells in and out of orbit, hop from planet to planet, and dive bomb your enemies. Explore a vast variety of arenas which feature several gravitational mechanics such as planets, orbiting moons, spinning space stations, and even treacherous black holes.

name: Glory of War
description: Glory of War is a nostalgic strategic turn-based RPG that combines the SLG mechanics.

name: Revenge of the Orcs: Flag of Conquest
description: A fantasy visual novel about the end of an era when humans and orcs are at war. Driven by a burning desire for revenge, one orc hoists a flag of rebellion. Soon, it will become a flag of conquest!

name: UFO99
description:
Perform your best flying, speeding and dodging skills with your favorite character!
Block monsters can be found floating around in this colorful universe, so watch out! Pick up big hammers and smash them. Keep challenging levels to get a higher rank and score!
Giant bosses hide away in the Demon Key. Dodge their attacks, pick up magic items and fight back. Retrieve the long-lost UFO99 letter gems!
Features of UFO99:
#Super Easy - Flying & Combat
Fly, speed-up, dodge, pick up hammers and smash block monsters!
#Super Fun - Local Multiplayer Co-op Game
1-4 player co-op mode. Play with friends and family!
#Super Healing - Character Gashapons
Over 60 cute, healing characters. Fight with different characters each time!
#Super Relaxing - Play Anytime, Even For A Short Time
Each game requires only about 1 to 3 minutes. Lots of random levels with endless variations!
#Super Exciting - Combat Giant Bosses
Giant bosses are in hiding. Stay alert and feel the thrill of this easy-to-play game!
#Super Rich - Special Power-up Items
5 special power-up items allow you to always be the winner!
#Super Cute - Colorful Graphics
The various bright colors and cute styles can light up your day!
Tons of gold coins and items are given away each day!Download now to get countless gifts!
Start playing today!

name: Witchhazel Woods
description: Your dog has been kidnapped by a lonely ghost! To save her, you must go on a journey through the woods, helping the creatures you meet along the way.

name: Charlie and Friends
description: Welcome to the world of Charlie and Friends! Currently looking for a new caretaker for our beloved characters: Charlie the Cat, Hilda the Hyena, Sammy the Snake, and Rosy the Rabbit.

name: Fishing: North Atlantic - Complete Edition
description: Commercial fishing in North Atlantic!

name: Spider Slingers
description: Play as a web-slinging spider and struggle your way to the top in this unforgiving rage platformer.

name: SokoChess
description: SokoChess is a minimalistic puzzle game about pushing chess pieces. Use your pieces to push the black figures to their destination, but be careful! The opposing pieces will capture yours if you give them the chance!

name: Traumada
description: Welcome to the horrific altered memories of my childhood home.

name: Super Bullet Break: Day 1 Edition
description: Super Bullet Break is a one-of-a-kind strategy deck builder filled with a wild bunch of cute and colourful characters - 'Bullets' - each and every one of them unique in their own way. Rescue online games from total destruction in a world where online multiplayer games have been taken over by a rogue AI! Can you save the world, defeat enemies in strategic turn-based battles, and beat Super Bullet Break?

name: Super Bullet Break
description: Super Bullet Break is a one-of-a-kind strategy deck builder filled with a wild bunch of cute and colourful characters - 'Bullets' - each and every one of them unique in their own way. Rescue online games from total destruction in a world where online multiplayer games have been taken over by a rogue AI! Can you save the world, defeat enemies in strategic turn-based battles, and beat Super Bullet Break?

name: Dancing Cube
description: "Dancing Cube" is a multiplayer musical bullet-hell, where players must avoid red obtacles in a giant 3D cube that deforms to the rhythm of the music. Play in solo modes or challenge your friends to see who handles the beat better.

name: NaGongGan Infinite
description: Easy and fast play, Feel the primal action of a first-person 3D shooter Once again! Enjoy the Exciting bgm, strange story and play flow. follow the road. There are monster standing in your way, kill them all. And keep going. Check out the end of the road. What will be your destiny?

name: Aznana
description: Aznana is an idle adventure game developed by Caramel Column for mobile. Every villager has a music box or a sunflower head, except our protagonist. One day, he picked up a head named AZNANA and became friends with it. Players need to save their money, and getaway from the boring town they live in.

name: Codename Nemesis
description: Codename Nemesis is an indie, top down, action/stealth RPG set in a 70's Noir themed world with story-rich, movie-styled cinematics and retro low poly, comic book style graphics.

name: City Eye
description:
In the world of City Eye, you'll become an operator of the Central Monitoring System, which will try to prevent the effects of every single transgression in the game. Use the city map to track dangerous areas and don't let the suspects run away from the police.
City Eye lets you operate hundreds of cameras at once to have a precise insight into every district you feel that may be endangered. Use this to your advantage and find the danger before it's too late!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Banquet of Helix
description:
Version 5.9 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the conclusion of the Elysium Everlasting arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Helical Contraption
• New Story Chapter XXXI: Für Elysia
• New Animated Short: Because of You
• New Featured Event: Summer Survival Rhapsody Side A
• ...and more!

name: Six Hours at Hugo's
description:
You are an unemployed college junior who is strapped for cash. While browsing the Yellow Pages, you notice an ad for a night watchman position at Hugo's Hole in the Wall. It looks simple enough, and you could definitely use the money. You decide to give them a call and see when you can start.
Little do you know what awaits...

name: Growers
description: Growers is a chaotic platformer multiplayer PvP game in which players compete with each other to reach the light on a dark map, to transform into a monster and devour the others. The game has full 4 controller support and is local multiplayer only , though you can use parsec to play online with your friends.

name: R.I.P
description: Kevin is a police officer who is looking for a very dangerous killer. After receiving an anonymous call, he decides to check out the place.

name: Nightstars
description:
Nightstars is a Five Nights at Freddy's fan-game developed by Bonzee & Co.

It's a short one night game focusing on reaction times and prioritisation skills. Expect some twists, fresh mechanics and more!

name: The Descent
description: Can you get rid of the town's curse?

name: Coldline
description:
A 50 megaton nuclear warhead will strike New York City in 10 minutes.

I think it's time to.... call the president.

name: Pokémon Shattered Light
description: Pokémon Shattered Light is a fan made Pokémon game. It is not a ROM Hack, but rather a game made in RPG Maker XP, using the Pokemon Essentials kit.

name: Tiny Tina's Wonderlands: Shattering Spectreglass
description: Unleash elemental fury as the all-new Blightcaller! Shattering Spectreglass introduces an additional Fatemaker class, a bevy of customization options, and an enormous, multi-headed wyvern to hunt down and destroy!

name: Quiz.com
description:
Play 1000s of free quizzes on your PC. Challenge your friends on any device.
Use phones or tablets as controllers and compete in multiple question types.

name: Car Racing: Highway Driving Simulator
description: Car Racing Highway Driving Simulator - start your engines and step on the gas!

name: My Perfect Hotel
description: Ever dreamed of running your own hotel? Start from the ground up in this fun and fast-paced time-management game where the aim is to build an accommodation empire and demonstrate your dedication to hospitality. Show your skills as a hotel manager, invest wisely in staff and property improvements, and work your socks off to become a hospitality tycoon in this addictive and entertaining casual simulator.

name: Master of A Secret Dream World
description:
Announcing Master of A Secret Dream World from our Bishoujo Story Contest winner - Nathaniel!

Alone in a deserted, ethereal world where the sun never sets, you and your companion live a life free from worry, trouble... and pain. You both spend almost every moment together having fun and exploring. But one day, two other girls show up to tell you that you're living in a dream…

name: The Red Solstice 2: Survivors - M.E.R.C.S.
description: Experience a new campaign that will continue after the events of the main storyline. Play as Grunt, and join the M.E.R.C.S as they survive out in the wastelands.

name: The Jumping Noodles
description:
Join BIG N on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!
Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Jeopardy! PlayShow: The Road to the All-Star Games
description: The Road to the All-Star Games contains episodes of our top Jeopardy! contestants and their journey to the All-Star Games tournament. Test your trivia know-how. Can you and your friends top the best Jeopardy! contestants?

name: Jeopardy! PlayShow: Tournament of Champions
description: Challenge yourself and go up against some of the best in Jeopardy! history. Some of Jeopardy!'s top competitors participate in this special collection. Do you have what it takes to top them?

name: Jeopardy! PlayShow: Captains Classics
description: Enhance your trivia knowledge and compete with friends, family, and top contestants. Jeopardy! PlayShow: All-Star Captains Classics contains hundreds of trivia questions, hours of content, and features select all-time Jeopardy! greats.

name: Jeopardy! PlayShow: College Championship
description: A fierce competition featuring colleges from across the country! The Jeopardy! College Championship promises to be a competition like you’ve never seen before.

name: Jeopardy! PlayShow: Teen Tournament
description: The adrenaline kicks in as the brightest and youngest contestants compete to be crowned champion of the Teen Tournament. Contestants, are you ready to strategize and place your wagers in this hand-picked collection?

name: Jeopardy! PlayShow: Best of the 1980's
description: Features hundreds of '80s trivia to test your Jeopardy! skills. Travel back in time and compete with contestants from the '80s in our handpicked best of the 1980s episode pack!

name: Rounds of Zombies
description: Classic zombie round survival. choose a map and see how many rounds you can survive with friends or alone.

name: Jylko: Through the Song
description: Jylko: Through The Song is a roguelike with an important difficulty. Combine your attacks with your dash and make your way through the enemies and bosses. Choose your equipment and your decisions well to try to go as far as possible.

name: Glyph-Bound: Kotodama
description: Track, train, and trade elemental spirits in Glyph-Bound! An indie MMORPG inspired by Pokemon Platinum, Final Fantasy Tactics, and Old School Runescape.

name: Ashita, Hajimete Kanojo to
description: With your unique girlfriend, exciting first date ADV.

name: AsteroIdle
description: An asteroid mining based idle game. Travel in space and discover.

name: Raccoon Run
description: Play as a raccoon in this fun, stealth-based food retrieval game! Avoid rats and Animal Control while you collect food for your pack and explore the city of Scratchton.

name: Garden of Seif: Curse of Gravehollow Peaks
description: Lost in the cursed mountains of Gravehollow Peaks, two rival assassins must set their differences aside and find a way home... unless something finds them first. A story-rich fantasy with magic, romance, and choices that matter.

name: Sengoku Princess
description: After a "time slip" the first person you run into is a female Nobunaga Oda?! Can the worst possible outcome be avoided?!

name: My Therapy
description: A visual novel about cute melancholic girls!

name: Cult of the Lamb: Cultist Edition
description: Cult of the Lamb: Cultist Edition bundles the base game with the exclusive Cultist Pack that includes a seven-piece decoration pack for your charming commune, as well as five exclusive Follower forms. You'll be the envy of every cult.

name: Tightrope Theatre
description: Tightrope Theatre is now hiring daredevils! Hop on a shaky unicycle and complete increasingly dangerous tightrope acts! Do you have what it takes to become a superstar?

name: My Destiny
description: My Destiny is a single-player game about a bear cub who follows his mysterious fate,wandering through a cold,but at the same time amazing world.Discover the touching fate of the bear cub and go all the way to the end.

name: Godsbane Idle
description: Explore a multitude of upgrade paths and a gigantic skilltree with more than 700 nodes to become the incarnation of destruction. Use your destructive potential to challenge the mighty seraphim, rulers of ages past. Face paradigm shifts and a multitude of new features along your gameplay journey.

name: Twilight Bride: Vormslegend
description: An accident, Philip met the "bride" Alice. Although Alice looks no different from ordinary people, she has long been a person in the world. With the deepening of their communication, simple Alice fell in love with this brave and kind boy Philip.... But Philip had an engagement with Sophia....

name: Touhou Crisis
description: Classic arcade nostalgia and modern-indie design collide in this shooting-gallery boss battler! Play as a one-man army in offline solo OR bring a friend in online co-op/versus mode! Supports Mouse AND Lightgun play!

name: Ultrarush
description: Ultrarush is a free-to-play, fast-paced arena shooter where you fight for tokens in the middle of arena. It highly relies on movement, reflexes and gamesense.

name: Perseverance: Part 3
description: Perseverance: Part 3 is the much-awaited conclusion to the drama/horror visual novel series full of intrigue, guts, and gossip. Swap between Jack, a father trying to protect his family, and Karen, an ex-agent on the run from her troubled past, and help them form an unlikely alliance.

name: Paranormal Preparatory School
description: This school for supernaturals isn't hell, but it is a hellmouth! Can you make peace between the vampires and werewolves, and close the portal to hell?

name: Escape the Backrooms
description: You've fallen into the backrooms and now need to find a way to escape. Traverse through eerie procedurally generated levels while avoiding entities and other danger.

name: Warplanes: Battles over Pacific
description: Warplanes: Battles over Pacific opens the next chapter in aviation history. Become a World War II pilot and take part in the campaign against the Empire of Japan. The sequel to the hit Warplanes: WW1 Fighters, takes dogfight to a new level.

name: Stranger
description: Stranger is a VR and first person lore-driven horror game where you defend your house against an unknown enemy. Make use of the provided locks and lock the windows when you hear the Stranger nearby. You can choose different levels of difficulty and choose from different maps and uncover the story of your player, the Stranger, and more. Hidden stories and lore-driven cryptic messages will be left to be discovered.

name: Rumbleverse
description:
Rumbleverse is a brand new, free-to-play, 40-person Brawler Royale where anyone can be a champion.

In February 2023, Epic games announced that it was shutting down all support and servers for Rumbleverse. This took effect as of 28th February 2023.

name: Cult of the Lamb
description: Cult of the Lamb casts players in the role of a possessed lamb saved from annihilation by an ominous stranger, and must repay their debt by building a loyal following in his name. Start your own cult in a land of false prophets, venturing out into diverse and mysterious regions to build a loyal community of woodland worshippers and spread your Word to become the one true cult.

name: Arcade Paradise
description: Welcome to Arcade Paradise, the 90’s retro arcade adventure game. With the keys to the family laundromat, Ashley decides to transform the business and give the sleepy town of Grindstone something to get excited about! Stay one step ahead of your father, manage and invest profits, and build your very own Arcade Paradise!

name: Invisible Seams
description: This story is a spinoff to my free fantasy dating sim Lovewood! However, you don't need any prior knowledge to understand and enjoy Invisible Seams.

name: Solitaire
description: The classic card solitaire, now for Vircon32, with difficulty selection (drawing 1, 2 or 3 cards).

name: Touhou: Hotline Sanzu
description: An arcade shooter / immersive sim where you solve problems with guns, backstabs, and strategic use of vents.

name: Hexa Hysteria
description: Welcome, to the world of Hexa Hysteria! Experience our innovative game-play, unlock various music, and explore the incredible stories from the distant past!

name: Illusion Inexistante
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Title Update 1
description: A hunter's work is never done. New threats emerge and your investigations into the Anomaly take a step forward in free Title Update 1.

name: Yume Memochou
description:
Yume Memochou is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame, starring Shiranaishi. The objective of the game is to collect "Charas" (effects) and "Treasures".

Every time Shiranaishi dreams, the type of day cycles through. There are 4 types of "special days". The type of day can be chosen in the options menu using the object in the left side of the bedroom. Depending on what special day it is, important collectible objects may or may not appear.

name: How 2 Dreams
description: Collaborative flatgame anthology showing in 10 chapters how dreams are made.

name: LandBox
description:
A creative world. You can interact with the metaverse inside our mall. The mall will have ways for you to chat with friends and meet new metaverse enthusiasts. You can visit other people’s lands that could have been created by a landowner or an actual company. LandBox team will be creating strategic partnerships to help expand the possibilities inside the metaverse. An example of a partnership we could bring on a musician or a designer and they can set up a store highlighting their in-game items for sale.

Survival is key in LandBox players will need to do small missions looking for food, helping shops with a small task or even helping an old lady cross the street. You’ll earn the in-game currency. The in-game currency can be used in various ways.

Certain lands will have mini games as well that users can interact with. The LandBox game is an open world for gamers to enjoy the metaverse and creations at LandBox.

name: Limousine Parking Simulator
description: Your mission as a limousine driver is to learn how to drive almost perfect a limousine.

name: Under Waves
description: Under Waves is a twin-stick arena shooter mini-game inspired by arcade classics. Survive, killing endless waves of enemies, battling for high scores. Includes great 80's synthwave soundtrack!

name: Hotel Greenwood
description: Hotel Greenwood is a psychological horror and thriller game played with a first-person camera. explore this hidden hotel with its intense and dark atmosphere, solve the events, and witness the story behind the disaster that happened in the past.

name: Exiori
description: Depart on a multi-world adventure to find the legendary relic known as the Exiori to avenge your friend and return home.

name: Maze Ablaze
description: Maze Ablaze is a fast-paced strategy game where you move the walls of a maze to defend an explosive barrel from an oncoming flame! Move fast and think faster as you work with limited resources to survive as long as possible.

name: Weben Blocks 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Book Quest
description: Book Quest is an action adventure RPG presented in retro pixel art style featuring cinematic cutscenes and dialogue. Throughout this medieval fantasy, gameplay alternates between top-down and side-scrolling perspectives.

name: Colorful Recolor
description: Colorful Recolor is a fast-paced puzzle game with a kaleidoscopic collection of brain teasers. Play through 100 levels with engaging mechanics, striking biomes, 10+ distinct elements, and an abundance of colors. Paint your way through this colorful world!

name: Destoria: The Withering
description: Destoria: The Withering is a mini top down shooter game with a sole objective to survive as many waves as possible.

name: Hyperland
description: Pick up, fire and dodge the bombs! An action-packed multiplayer casual shooter with basic moves but still easy to play.

name: Sail
description: Open World VR Pirate Adventure Game!

name: Red Hood Adventure
description: Red Hood Adventure is a side-scrolling platform slasher game. An alternative story of Little Red Riding Hood, times are difficult and the Hat is armed with weapons. Grandma needs pies again and they need to be delivered. Creatures living in the forests also want pies, and maybe not only.

name: World of Cube
description: A first-person puzzle game. Explore the world of cube and solve the puzzles.

name: Memory Traces: Japan
description: Memory Traces: japan. It's a first-person 3D puzzle where the player needs to restore destroyed artifacts.

name: Oraxum Trials
description: Oraxum Trials is an incremental/idle game where you conduct experiments with the Oraxum, a hexagonal board with magical properties. Harvest souls and use mystical crystals to create wild concoctions. Take on the mantle of soul alchemist and forge your fate, choosing between light and dark forces.

name: Hide & Seek World
description: Online Multiplayer Hide and Seek! Learn about the world through Google Street View.

name: Subterranean Detectives Orin and Satori
description: Touhou Project point-and-click fangame

name: Pulling No Punches
description: Pulling No Punches is a satirical game in the 2D beat'em up style with classic arcade influences and modern visuals. Survive a fictional pandemic in a city filled with madness and denial.

name: Lost in Play
description: Go on a feel-good adventure with a brother and sister as they explore dreamscapes and befriend magical creatures. Lost in their imagination, Toto and Gal must stick together and solve puzzles to journey back home. This whimsical puzzle adventure game will make you feel like you're playing a cartoon!

name: Pud Pud in Weird World
description: In this surreal platformer from 1984, explore the Weird World and its bizzare denizens to find the 10 hidden bowls of pudding and reveal the secret exit - but watch out! Mrs Pud Pud isn't too happy about you stealing her pudding, and her kiss is deadly!

name: Hit Single
description: Sin descripción

name: Silver Level Pack
description: A pack of custom levels. This hack features seven levels with custom music, custom sprites and custom palettes.

name: Natsu to Hakaba to Urameshiya
description: A short midsummer BL game about being taken to the afterlife by a ghost.

name: HaremRoid VR
description:
You can interact with up to three characters at once. Create the harem of your dreams!
You can place files in the VRM folder to play with any character that you want, even ones not in the game already!
Animation, expressions, voice work, arrangement — it’s all up to you!

name: Donny Donut 3
description: Donny's new adventure is taking you to the Cyber Lands, to save the world from the evil Mark Donald. With the help of Pixie, a pixel, Donny's going to travel through cities, data and clouds to find Donno and Donna, his siblings...

name: Sky Fighters
description: A top-down, fast-paced shooter where you pilot a plane and use it to dogfight against those that seek to bring you down. Easy to understand but hard to master, the balance of risk-reward for score maximization while trying to not get overwhelmed is what this game is about! Try to reach to the highest score!

name: Gorehounds of Doom
description: Gorehounds of Doom is an 18 level megawad for doom 2 in mbf21 format started by Thelokk. The theme of the project was simple and unrestrictive, with each mapper creating something under their personal interpretation of horror in a doom wad. The result is a wide variety of maps ranging from atmospheric environmental storytelling to slaughter under a dark/gory aesthetic.

name: Thanks, Come Again
description: A game by Incisor Studios for the Cartomancy Anthology. A game about the day-to-day of a simple shopkeeper and their complex wares. Try not to give too much of yourself away.

name: Vampirix
description: Vampirix is a multiplayer casual real time strategy game developed in real Transylvania. It's an old school like game, with build and fight strategies, with resources, armies and economy.

name: The Hole in the Cabin
description: After running out of gas, you take refuge in a cabin in the middle of the forest.

name: Survivor.io
description:
Dangerous zombies are attacking the entire city! The city is in peril!
Awakened by the trial of dreams, you've no choice but to take on the heroic mantle of saving the city!
As a human warrior with unlimited potential, you and other survivors will have to pick up your weapons and battle these evil and dangerous zombies!
The horde far outnumbers you - any slip-up and you'll get caught in dire straits!
Faced with crisis, you must find a way to survive!

name: Monster Hunter Rise: DLC Pack 6
description:
This additional content includes:

- "Summer Hat" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Summer Top" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Summer Bracelets" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Summer Belt" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Summer Pants" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Fiorayne" Hunter layered armor set
- "Utsushi" Hunter layered armor set
- "F Summer" Palico layered armor set
- "C Summer" Palamute layered armor set
- "For the Fans" gesture set
- Trumpet Pose Set
- "Malzeno Menace" face paint
- "Single Stroke Cheek" face paint
- "Spiribird Edge" hairstyle
- "Fiorayne Short" hairstyle
- Hunter Voice: Fiorayne
- Hunter Voice: Galleus
- "Monster & Title Music: Piano Version" BGM
- "Monster Hunter Series Bases Pt. 2" BGM
- "Special Stickers 10" sticker set

name: Little Noah: Scion of Paradise - Avatar, Lilliput, and Accessory Pack
description:
The contents of the Little Noah: Scion of Paradise DLC 1: Avatar, Lilliput, and Accessory Pack are as follows.

Avatars
Talk to the Champion on the airship with the "Avatars" speech bubble over her head to change to one of these new avatars.
1. Gourmet Guild Princess Noah
2. White Mage Noah

Lilliputs
These Lilliputs appear at random in the ruins. Enlist their aid and expand your repertoire!
1. Halvor
2. Pirate King Kidd
3. Goddess Amelie

Accessories
These accessories appear at random in the ruins.
1. Conflagrant Regalia
2. Crystalline Regalia
3. Fulminous Regalia
4. Master Merchant's Turban
5. Trusty Piggy Bank

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 19
description: A new gun, car and gear for Deston, a custom lobby and a new collaboration with a killer franchise (Assassin's Creed).

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Nezuko Advanced Demon Form
description: Nezuko Kamado (Advanced Demon Form) will become a playable character.

name: Round Invaders Red
description: Sin descripción

name: Quake: Coppertone Summer Jam 2
description: Suns out, guns out! The second annual Coppertone Summer Jam is a 22 (+start) map jam for the Copper mod (included) that peels Ranger out of the cold and dark, thrusting him into sunny and hot environments from veteran and new mappers alike!

name: Shadowverse: Champion's Battle - Legendary Edition
description: Introducing the Shadowverse: Champion's Battle Legendary Edition, bringing together the original strategic card battle game and the "Mythical Cards Premium Pass + 10 Levels" downloadable content.

name: Little Noah: Scion of Paradise - Special Edition
description: This set includes the Little Noah: Scion of Paradise main game and the DLC 1+2 pass.

name: Neave 2
description: Explore the world of Neave 2 as you hunt for magical floating cubes. If you're feeling competitive, race for the fastest time to claim a top spot on the leaderboard.

name: Neon Fighter
description: Neon Fighter is an extremely challenging and fast-paced arcade game where your gun switches automatically every 7 seconds or so, creating very intense situations and testing your reflexes, adaptability, and decision-making skills.

name: Magic Сity Detective: Secret Desire - Collector's Edition
description: The Others are experiencing another trouble. Prevent the upcoming bloody conflict between the elves and vampires! Someone is trying to bring discord to the fragile world of the Others. Will they succeed? It depends on you. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Underwater battles
description: Underwater battles - casual puzzle game made in 2D graphics.

name: Pinch of Fighting Girls
description: Pinch of Fighting Girls is a cute sideways action fighting game! You must control the fighting girls and clear all the monsters in the map!

name: Aleon's Nightmare
description: Aleon is a young girl who is looking for a job. One day she found a job but things didn’t go well as she wishes. You have to find out the odd things happening in the mysterious house and You need to survive in the middle of psychopath puppets. And remember... You are in the middle of nightmare.

name: Snow Journey: Nitro
description: Sin descripción

name: Embodiment
description: In this 2D puzzle platformer, take control of a blob with the ability to take control and embody skeletons. Use their abilities to swim, climb, and fly through the facility.

name: Sissa's Path
description: Sissa's Path is a sokoban game where you play as the kitten Sissa! You will have the opportunity to get to know one of the curious hobbies of Sissa's: Playing with her toys! Help Sissa move her toys to the corrrect spot in this fun but challenging game. Can you help Sissa organize her toys?

name: Stereo Boy
description: A chill, innovative sci-fi adventure where you explore two isometric worlds at the same time. Teleport between worlds to navigate impossible terrain and solve mind-bending puzzles. Along the way, you'll fend off hostile creatures and uncover the story of a lost civilization.

name: The Final Answer
description: A survival horror trivia game. Survive traps and twisted games by answering trivia questions. Incorrect answers lead to death.

name: Garden Guardian
description: Take control of master gardener Snippy Shrubs and keep your garden safe at all costs! A new take on classic LCD games, rethought through a modern lens! Complete objectives through 18 Trial levels, or hop into the four Endless levels to show that you can garden with the best of them!

name: Attacker-chan!
description: Attacker-chan! is a 2.5D short, roguelike action game with cute animations. Complete your missions by subduing out-of-control mechs.

name: Pip
description: Pip is a cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes.

name: Underway
description: When Leo gets a request from his boss to come in to work at an unusual time, he's confused, but goes in anyway. When he gets there, his boss tells him to come up to his office. But when Leo attempts to go up, he faces some obstacles... Find your way to the fifth floor and figure out what's going on!

name: Apollo's Adventure
description: Step into the shoes of Apollo and try to find the Sage of Wisdom as you explore many levels and face multiple puzzles.

name: The One Penny Adventure
description: Cross Aremica with only one penny and deliver the penny to mrBest. You have one penny and have to trade it for bigger and better items until you sell your last item and have enough money to buy a plane ticket to the next city, You have to cross 5 cities in order to deliver mrBest the penny.

name: Super Demon Survivors
description: Super Demon Survivors is a homage to time survival reverse bullet hells, set in a familiar world pitting multiple characters against hordes of demons and monsters in a multistage free for all.

name: Poly Memory: Primates
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal memory game with primates.

name: Mutagenic
description: Mutagenic is a rogue-lite with simple controls, yet engaging mechanics. The rules are simple: mutate, kill, collect, unlock, die. Repeat. Kill monsters, collect mutagen, spend mutagen to upgrade characters. Mutagen is not permanent, how will you spend it?

name: Apex Legends: Hunted
description: Vantage’s mother may have raised her to survive the wilds of Págos, but she never crossed paths with a Legend. With her squadmates' help, she’ll need to discover the will to survive.

name: Kittens in Post-Apocalyptic Fantasy San Francisco: Battle School for Only the Most Awesome Monsters
description: Save a fallen land from despair and doom via recruiting and training adorable but deadly (and awesome) monsters!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus
description: At the heart of Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus lies a richly detailed tactical game, played out as intense fast-paced skirmishes in PVE campaigns and tightly competitive PVP battles, as well as massively collaborative guild boss fights. With a deep and ever-expanding story penned by renowned Warhammer writer Matt Forbeck, Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus will tell stories across factions, as players build and customize their armies with epic and legendary units from the Ultramarines, Necrons, Adepta Sororitas, Black Legion, and many more to be revealed. Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus has something for every type of player.

name: Collapsed
description: Challenge your mind with a 3D physics-based puzzle game. Take control of a cannon and use your limited supply of cannonballs to bring each level crashing to the ground. Using gravity, momentum, and logic, plan how to knock down each structure and leave nothing standing after the collapse!

name: Cartomancy Anthology
description: The Cartomancy Anthology is a virtual tarot deck of 22 games from 22 teams that replicate the actions and experiences of tarot readings by shuffling and drawing cards. Pull a single game, or a spread of three, for a digital reading. Launch and complete each game to collect all the cards and complete your virtual tarot deck!

name: Kojimachi Island
description: Kojimachi is a widget style pet game where you can feed and care for your pet on the island you decorate.

name: Force of Warships: Battleship
description: Direct your battleship to glorious victory! Online battle under your leadership!

name: Just Go
description: You will experience from absolute Novice to Top Go player, and show your talents in major Go leagues! The game also includes notable Go matches in history for you to explore. The full-dubbing tutorial for beginners will let you appreciate the charm of Go!

name: Two Point Campus: Enrollment Edition
description:
Build the university of your dreams with Two Point Campus, the follow up management sim with a twist from the creators of Two Point Hospital. Get to know your students, explore their personalities and fulfill their wants and needs. Craft buildings, choose courses, hire the best staff and build an academic institution to stand the test of time.

The Enrollment Edition includes:
- Exclusive Enrollment Edition packaging and artwork
- A Fold out paper campus poster map, slightly bigger than A3 in size
- Two Point Bonus DLC pack, including exclusive in game items for both Two Point Campus & Two Point Hospital

name: Timothy and the Tower of Mu
description: Ascend the tower to save your grandfather in this classic, hardcore action-platformer. The Tower of Mu is waiting for you... Push past each check point to the next awaiting challenge; dashing, jumping, and slinging your way up to the towers peak. Die. learn. Overcome.

name: Dream Cycle
description: Trapped in a cursed alternate dimension, arcane apprentice Morgan Carter faces an epic quest to save both her soul and the shattered Dreamlands. Use stealth, spells, and weapons to defeat enemies and purge the corruption while exploring thousands of shards of this ever-expanding action adventure.

name: Last Night of Winter
description: A souls-like action-RPG with lots of battles and exploration. Defeat your enemies, steal their weapons, and uncover the secret of the stronghold.

name: Two Point Campus
description: Build the university of your dreams with Two Point Campus, the follow up management sim with a twist from the creators of Two Point Hospital. Get to know your students, explore their personalities and fulfill their wants and needs. Craft buildings, choose courses, hire the best staff and build an academic institution to stand the test of time.

name: Farthest Frontier
description: Protect and guide your people as you forge a town from untamed wilderness at the edge of the known world. Harvest raw materials, hunt, fish and farm to sustain your advancing town. Produce craft items for villagers to trade, consume, equip and fight with as you battle for your survival against the elements and outside threats.

name: RiiMajor
description: Sin descripción

name: Castlevania: Dawn of Shovel
description: Sin descripción

name: Wrath of the Titans
description: A complete 9-level episode featuring some new textures and classic Heretic style with attention to Raven's mapping conventions. The set plays on the episode 2 slot. It includes 8 revised editions of ETTiNGRiNDER's prior released ﻿maps to update the visuals and gameplay, plus 1 never before released one (E2M2)

name: Heaven Stroll
description: Demons invaded a bungalow of yours and your friends. Get them out !

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Ultimate Edition 2022
description:
Ultimate Edition 2022 includes the base game (Guilty Gear -Strive-), Season Pass 1, Season Pass 2 and the Ultimate Edition Contents Kit.
Early purchasers of the Xbox releases, from release till April 13th, also got the exclusive Special Colors for Sol and Ky.

Season Pass 1 includes 5 characters, 2 stages, an exclusive story expansion and the Additional Character Color Pack which adds 5 color variations for all 20 characters available with Season Pass 1.

Season Pass 2 includes 4 characters, 2 stages and the Additional Character Color Pack 2 which adds 6 color variations for the 4 characters added in Season Pass 2.

Ultimate Edition Contents Kit includes the Digital Soundtrack, Digital Artwork and the Ultimate Edition Special Colors which adds 1 color variant for all 20 characters available with Season Pass 1.
A color variant in Additional Character Color Pack 2 matches the Ultimate Edition Special Colors for Season Pass 2 characters.

Delisted on August 24th, 2023 with the release of Season Pass 3 and the Daredevil Edition

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Season Pass 2
description: Season Pass 2 includes 4 characters, 2 stages and a color pack with 6 variations for the new characters.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character Color Pack 2
description: An additional color pack including 6 colors for the 4 additional characters of GGST Season 2 (total of 24 colors).

name: Don't Go, Pikachu!
description:
No time to rest! Pikachu has been kidnapped and needs your help!

Battle your way through five randomly generated environments in this unique roguelike adventure!
Beating the game rewards a badge and unlocks new starters — can you collect all?

Short roguelike Pokémon fangame that runs with a fast combat system featuring permadeath and limited PP.

name: Fall Guys: Crow Pack
description:
This'll give you something to crow about!

Bundle Includes:
Crow Costume (Upper and Lower)
600 x Show-Bucks

name: Unsorted VHS
description: "Unsorted VHS" is an atmospheric puzzle horror game. Sort through a box of miscellaneous VHS tapes. Retrace your steps and figure out how you got here. Everything is interlinked, don't you remember?

name: Shoot Run
description: Shoot Run is a first-person paintball shooter

name: SuperVHS
description: A mildly famous warehouse lurks somewhere deep in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Hidden by relentless snow (or possibly that technology from 1994's The Shadow), spoken of only under whispered breath. Legends of sets, props, and bad movies as far as the eye can see. No one has returned from this place in a thousand years. No one...until now!

name: Ninja Ducks vs Pirate Pigs
description:
Since the dawn of time, two sides have been locked in rivalry… The mysterious ninja. Quick, cunning, and precise! Versus, the fearless pirates. Troublesome, rowdy, and ruthless.

Battle across the lands, leap over daunting drops, and plow through enemy hordes. Blades, shurikens, thunder, and fire! Who will win?

Fight your way through 100 levels! Your agility, your skills - all will be tested.

name: Fallen World
description: An independent 2D Pixel Art style game in which you embark on your adventure to investigate what happened in the world after the disappearance of the human footprint, a prediction you made a long time ago and now you must investigate the events that occurred.

name: The Ultimate FMV Bundle 2
description: Wales Interactive is proud to offer the ultimate bundle for their very best FMV games! Featuring Night Book, Who Pressed Mute on Uncle Marcus? Bloodshore, Five Dates and I Saw Black Clouds in one bundle!

name: Fill and Cross Pirate Riddles 3
description: To sail or not to sail? What kind of question is that?! While others mull it over, you can be the first to find the treasure!

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 6: Bridget
description: This allows the character "Bridget" to be used in-game.

name: The King of Fighter XV: Characters - Team Awakened Orochi
description: [Product Contents]- Orochi Yashiro, Orochi Shermie, and Orochi Chris of "Team AWAKENED OROCHI" can be used in THE KING OF FIGHTERS XV.

name: Knight Solitaire 3
description: Win a tournament, defeat a dragon… What other deed should a knight perform? Save a princess in Knight Solitaire 3!

name: Mosaics Galore: Glorious Journey
description: Mosaics Galore. Glorious journey. 100 magical mosaics await you!

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Legends of Mystery 6
description: Otherworldly forces exist. You can make sure of this by putting together the puzzle pieces from the new game Legends of Mystery 6.

name: The Cold Forest
description: The Cold Forest is a hardcore survival walking simulator game. You have a goal, and it's important, but can you achieve it?

name: Capitals
description: A mash-up of the common idle clicker genre and a city builder, Capitals is a fast-paced and competitive strategy game. Each match is set on a resizable game board made up of hexagonal tiles, randomly generated each time you play.

name: The Twilight of Infinity Episode 3: A Deuce of Devils
description: A time travelling journey to 1486 leads to a sinister game of cards where even the Devil may have taken on more than he bargained for.

name: Welcome to Chornobayivka VR
description: At that day the Russians start a miss planed attack against the Ukraine, Joe grabs his preferred weapon to stop the Zombie Russian Soldiers that got infected by a sick experiment of Putin. Fight for democracy and freedom in a wave like horror VR shooter experience for free.
